title_zh: 開放勞動基金(勞退6-12%)有限度自選投資組合
proposal_zh:
勞退基金為專有專戶, 近年來勞退基金運用績效不佳, 且被挪用的新聞層出不窮，建議可以效法美國401K有限度開放自選組合。 
 
 勞動基金運用績效不佳 (參照底下連結): 至109年9月底, 勞工退休基金基金規模35,431億, 虧損103.3億, 收益-0.3%。 此績效實在讓一般人難以理解，若是買被動ETF定期定額投入不至於會如此糟糕，更甚此為要放長期的基金，不適合人為去操盤。而且動不動國安基金就會進場接盤，請問這些基金的動用有經過該專戶的人同意嗎? 
 被挪用的新聞(參照底下連結): 勞動部官員挪用基金卻只需要記過, 而勞退基金虧損的情況卻是要人民共同承擔。 
 有限度開放自選組合: 因為是放長期的基金, 建議定期定額並買ETF, 優點網路上都有就不詳述。而想更積極的投資人可以選擇自己要的投資組合。 而如果勞工選擇要自己選股, 理當就排除最低收益保證,盈虧自負。
benefits_zh:
被動自選投資的好處 
 
 減少基金經理人的經手費用以及潛在的人為貪汙 
 可以排除最低保證收益, 政府可以少負擔這些費用 
 連巴菲特都打敗不了的績效就是指數被動投資
proposal_en: Retirement Fund is a special account. In recent years, the performance of the Retirement Fund has been poor, and news of misappropriation has emerged in an endless stream. It is recommended to follow the example of the US 401K with limited opening of self-selected portfolios. Poor performance of labor funds (refer to the link below): By the end of September 2019, the size of the labor pension fund was 3.5431 billion, with a loss of 10.33 billion and a gain of -0.3%. This performance is really difficult for ordinary people to understand. It would not be so bad if you buy passive ETFs for regular fixed investment. What's more, this is a long-term fund that is not suitable for artificial manipulation. Moreover, the National Security Fund will come in to take orders at every turn. Is the use of these funds approved by the people in the special account? News about misappropriation (refer to the link below): Officials from the Ministry of Labor only need to record demerits for misappropriating funds, but the loss of the Labor Retirement Fund is shared by the people. Limited optional portfolio: Since it is a long-term fund, it is recommended to regularly set quotas and buy ETFs. The advantages are all available on the Internet, so I won’t go into details. Investors who want to be more active can choose the portfolio they want. And if workers choose to choose their own stocks, they should exclude the minimum return guarantee and be responsible for their own profits and losses.
title_en: Open labor fund (retirement 6-12%) limited self-selected investment portfolio

title_zh: 汽機車燃料稅應隨油徵收
proposal_zh:
汽機車燃料稅，目前是以車子的引擎排放量為基準，作為費率標準，這完全是一個莫名其妙的制度
顧名思義，燃料稅課徵的目的是「燃料使用所造成的社會成本」，例如空汙、噪音、碳排放等等；這樣的話，課徵的標準，當然是使用燃料的多寡
例如同樣是1800 c.c. 的汽車，每年使用的汽油（或柴油）量，可能天差地別，如何能一概而論？
要衡量使用燃料的多寡，最顯而易見的方式，當然就是燃油的使用量！
鄰近的新加坡、日本、韓國，早已實施燃料稅隨油徵收多年，因而表面上看來每公升油價高於台灣，但事實上因內含燃料稅，對於駕駛人反而更加划算且公平！不會因為持有一台cc數較大的車子，就必須每年固定被課徵高額燃料稅，無論使用里程多寡
（附帶一提，較高引擎排放量的汽車，可能體積較大，使用路權較多，理應負擔較多的稅負，此部份已由較高的牌照稅所cover，與燃料稅實無關聯）
因此本提案建議：汽機車的燃料稅，改為附加於汽柴油的消費上，也就是隨油徵收
benefits_zh:
帶來的利益：

回歸使用者（污染者）付費，有效減少空氣污染與碳排放：台灣目前的人均碳排放量是全球第一！除了許多高污染工業之外，大量的汽機車也難辭其咎，而燃料稅這種打混仗的徵收方式，就是導致汽機車污染高居不下的主因之一。如果燃料稅改為隨油徵收，勢必使得大量使用燃料（因而製造大量污染與碳排放）的汽車，受到成本提升的壓力，而開始設法減少燃料使用，從而減少空汙與碳排。這必帶來更好的空氣品質與低碳環境！

 
影響：

地下油品氾濫。這是交通部這幾十年來，面對燃料稅隨油徵收主張時，所採取一貫的說詞（請參考http://newtalk.tw/news/view/2016-03-23/71423?），但事實上，唯一的佐證，是在民國五十年那次的隨油徵收經驗，距今已整整55年了，時空背景完全不同！時至今日，到底還有多少地下油品的來源？以及，到底還會有多少運輸工具，會冒險使用來源不明的油品？
大眾運輸成本提高：可考慮另案補助
proposal_en: The fuel tax for automobiles and motorcycles is currently based on the engine emissions of the vehicle as the rate standard. This is a totally inexplicable system. As the name suggests, the purpose of fuel tax collection is "the social cost caused by fuel use", such as air pollution, noise, carbon emissions, etc. In this case, the standard of taxation is of course the amount of fuel used. For example, the amount of gasoline (or diesel) used by a car with the same 1800 c.c. The most obvious way to measure the amount of fuel used is of course the amount of fuel used! Neighboring Singapore, Japan, and South Korea have already implemented fuel tax collection along with the fuel for many years, so it seems that the price per liter of fuel is higher than Taiwan, but in fact, because the fuel tax is included, it is more cost-effective and fair for drivers! It will not be necessary to levy high fuel tax every year just because you own a car with a large cc number, no matter how much mileage you use.
title_en: Automobile fuel tax should be levied along with oil

title_zh: 暫緩將核四燃料棒送出國 ，並請台電為全國人民舉辦公聽會說明為何需要將燃料棒急著送出國
proposal_zh:
訴求： 
(1) 暫緩將核四燃料棒送出台灣. 
      核四燃料棒購買花費國家80億,目前如果送出除了招受經濟損失外,更將台灣能源穩定的一個選項破滅。將來要進口燃料必須要看美國臉色,而美國可能為了自己的利益不販售燃料棒給台灣,讓台灣的能源自主力量弱化,將來中國包圍台灣只要30天台灣將無電力可用. 
  
(2) 請台電舉辦公聽會說明為何需要急著把燃料棒送出國 
台電長期為台灣專業付出,是一個公平公正的國營單位並深得國人信賴. 台電應該舉辦公聽會,讓人民了解為何要急著把燃料棒送出國.
benefits_zh:
(1) 將台電的燃料棒送出台灣,並不符合經濟效益 
  
http://pis.li/5H6LR  
政府花費80億買的燃料棒,現在又要花6億分三年陸續運回美國賤價用20億賣出. 
未來台灣如果又需要這批燃料棒,可能需要花費超過百億重新購置 
  
(2) 台灣真得缺電,缺到需要蓋汙染高的燃煤發電廠 
http://pis.li/5H7KY 
  
核四兩部機組,如果按下啟動按鈕. 可以提供270萬瓩台灣真的要把這個選像拿掉,把辛苦拿到可以用18個月的選擇拿掉嗎? 
天然氣: 台灣最大儲存14天燃煤: 台灣最大儲存30天核能: 一次添加燃料可用 540天 
  
(3) 總統政見10年內不大幅漲價的政見要落實 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iyMFKYuHTIg
proposal_en: Appeals: (1) Suspend the sending of nuclear four fuel rods to Taiwan. The purchase of nuclear four fuel rods cost the country 8 billion. At present, if they are sent out, in addition to incurring economic losses, it will also destroy an option for Taiwan's energy stability. Importing fuel in the future must depend on the face of the United States, and the United States may not sell fuel rods to Taiwan for its own benefit, weakening Taiwan’s energy independence. In the future, China will encircle Taiwan and Taiwan will have no electricity for 30 days. (2) Please hold a public hearing for Taipower to explain why it needs to send fuel rods out of the country.
title_en: Suspend the sending of nuclear four fuel rods abroad, and ask Taipower to hold a public hearing for the people of the whole country to explain why it is necessary to send fuel rods abroad in a hurry

title_zh: 開放大型重型機車使用機車停等區
proposal_zh:
機車停等區為一專供機車停等的區塊讓起步加速較快的機車可以優先起步促進體積較小的機車在車陣當中的流動緩解交通壅塞提高整體車流效率 
  
經與停等區設計者當面確認過後在設計原理上此一區塊供所有機車使用紅黃牌亦可使用停等區且同樣有緩解壅塞的效果 
  
目前制度把此種合理且有利於交通的行為判定為違規，並且須繳納罰款機車不能使用機車停等區完全不合理設計者對此一現況亦感到十分訝異 
  
希望政府必須盡速開放大型重型機車可於機車停等區停等紅燈且於修法完成前停止取締大型重型機車於機車停等區停等紅燈
benefits_zh: 提高道路面積利用率，減緩塞車，促進交通效率
proposal_en: The waiting area for locomotives is a block for locomotives to wait for, so that the faster-starting locomotives can start first to promote the flow of smaller locomotives in the queue to ease traffic congestion and improve the overall traffic flow efficiency. After confirming with the designer of the waiting area face to face, the design principle is that this area is for all locomotives to use the waiting area with red and yellow cards, and it also has the effect of relieving congestion. The completely unreasonable design is also very surprised by this situation. I hope the government must open up large and heavy motorcycles as soon as possible to stop at the red light in the motorcycle waiting area and stop banning large heavy motorcycles in the motorcycle waiting area to wait for the red light before the amendment is completed.
title_en: Locomotive Parking and Waiting Areas Open for Large Heavy Locomotives

title_zh: 將心理諮商及心理治療納入健保
proposal_zh: 現今心理諮商及治療需求日益升高，在無健保的情況下，單次費用千元以上，如此使得心理治療有門檻限制，資源僅能為經濟能力較高者所使用，不符合社會公平原則，且心理疾患不亞於生理疾患，心理與生理交錯影響，身體上的疾病可能影響心理，心理上之問題也可能造成生理上的問題，因此人民健康福祉不能只限縮於生理方面，心理方面更需要重視。
benefits_zh: 若社會公民能普遍享有同等及足夠心理資源管道，經過諮商或治療，人們能將原本面對心理困擾所消耗的能量，投入於到其他事物上，且整體社會公民之心理韌性將可能提升，對台灣未來發展會是莫大助力。
proposal_en: Nowadays, the demand for psychological counseling and treatment is increasing. In the absence of health insurance, the cost of a single session is more than 1,000 yuan. This makes psychological treatment a threshold limit. Resources can only be used by those with higher economic capabilities, which does not conform to the principle of social fairness. Mental illnesses are no less than physical illnesses. Psychology and physiology are intertwined. Physical illnesses may affect psychology, and psychological problems may also cause physical problems.
title_en: Incorporate psychological counseling and psychotherapy into health insurance

title_zh: 尊重健康狀態不適合打疫苗的族群/反對全面疫苗通行證及疫苗護照
proposal_zh:
由於我國現今施打疫苗造成死亡的人數已大幅超過染疫死亡的人數，疫苗並非唯一選項且有安全疑慮，對於健康狀態不適合打疫苗的族群，應當有其他合適的預防如漢方藥物、維生素補充、運動… 等來加強免疫力（依據 我國病人自主權利第4條其中內容，人民對醫療選項有選擇權和決定權），不可用全面疫苗通行證/疫苗護照來限制及剝奪沒打疫苗人民的工作權和生活基本人權。例如：沒有打一劑兩劑的黃卡，私人企業就不錄用或予以解職（雇主如果違反員工意願，以直接或間接方式強迫員工接種疫苗，已涉我國刑法第304條強制罪罪嫌），沒有打疫苗黃卡，就不能進入學校、大賣場、一些公共場所等。政府應該顧及不適合打疫苗的族群的生存權益，不被歧視，不被當做次等公民，不受打壓。 
目前已知有幾款口服防疫藥物即將問世，因此建議政府要顧念健康狀況不能打疫苗的人民 ，不宜施行全面疫苗通行證/疫苗護照。
benefits_zh:
1. 基於憲法第4條用藥選擇權和健康自主權的保障，人民對於醫療選項是有選擇權和決定權，我們相信政府是會尊重人民的權利。現在有越來越多數據已顯示人類本身的自然免疫系統對於新冠病毒的防禦力是高於疫苗的防禦力，無接種疫苗者可以是健康且安全的，並不會構成已接種疫苗者的健康威脅，而已接種疫苗者並不代表可以完全免疫。 
2. 讓台灣人民免於有無接種疫苗的分歧及分化，避免不必要的衝突與對立，減少社會亂象，有助於維護台灣社會秩序、穩定發展。 
3. 目前現行的疫苗皆為實驗針劑，無人知道長期副作用為何，若強制實施疫苗通行證/疫苗護照無亦是變相強制性人民接種疫苗，在長期副作用爆發的情況下，恐怕會造成健保費用可觀的支出。 
4. 維持家庭的正常運作。目前疫苗不良反應通報的死亡人數已經遠超過染疫死亡人數，且嚴重副作用更是達4000多筆，這意味有許多家庭遭受到家人的逝去而破碎，或承擔嚴重副作用所產生的沉重醫療費用，這無疑對任何發生不幸的家庭是多麼大的巨變，而這些家庭是否有能力承擔這樣的巨變呢？若無法承擔而造成家庭功能的喪失，對孩子從小的家庭教育至台灣整體社會長期穩定發展會是一大阻力。
proposal_en: Since the number of deaths caused by vaccination in our country has greatly exceeded the number of deaths caused by the epidemic, vaccines are not the only option and there are safety concerns. For groups whose health status is not suitable for vaccination, other appropriate preventive measures such as Kampo drugs, vitamin supplements, exercise...etc. For example: without a yellow card for one dose and two doses, private companies will not hire or dismiss them (if an employer violates the wishes of employees and directly or indirectly forces employees to vaccinate, it has been involved in the compulsory crime of Article 304 of the Criminal Law of my country), and without a yellow card for vaccination, they cannot enter schools, hypermarkets, and some public places. The government should take into account the survival rights of ethnic groups who are not suitable for vaccination, and should not be discriminated against, treated as second-class citizens, or suppressed. At present, it is known that several oral anti-epidemic drugs are about to come out, so it is suggested that the government should take care of people who cannot be vaccinated due to their health conditions, and it is not appropriate to implement a comprehensive vaccine passport/vaccine passport.
title_en: Respect for groups whose health status is not suitable for vaccination / oppose comprehensive vaccine passports and vaccine passports

title_zh: 『標』萊豬，護食安！1、萊豬進口嚴格把關 2、落實源頭管理新增特定貨號 3、再製品標示加註萊豬添加物
proposal_zh: 1.『萊』豬進口，嚴格把關：進口豬肉之再製品、混和產品、食品添加物之容器或外包裝，應標示是否含萊克多巴胺豬肉。（修改食安法）2. 落實源頭管理，新增特定貨號：豬肉進口廠商如進口含有萊克多巴胺之豬肉，應列特定貨號，以供辨識。（修改食安法）3.再製品標示，加註萊豬添加物：要求食品標示、食品添加物相關規定應增列標示是否使用含萊克多巴胺豬肉（修改食安法）。
benefits_zh: 透過政府「公共政策網路參與平台」，只要有#5000人以上連署，政府權責單位就必須要依照規定來回應民眾訴求。因此，針對政府萊豬進口議題，民眾黨的「公民連署書」提出下列主張： 1. 『萊』豬進口，嚴格把關：進口豬肉之再製品、混和產品、食品添加物之容器或外包裝，應標示是否含萊克多巴胺豬肉。（修改食安法）2. 落實源頭管理，新增特定貨號：豬肉進口廠商如進口含有萊克多巴胺之豬肉，應列特定貨號，以供辨識。（修改食安法）3.再製品標示，加註萊豬添加物：要求食品標示、食品添加物相關規定應增列標示是否使用含萊克多巴胺豬肉（修改食安法）。 透過政府「公共政策網路參與平台」，我們希望能夠匯聚民意，讓政府知道民眾對於食安議題確實非常在乎，也希望透過匯聚公民的力量，讓民進黨能找回過去「以民為本」的初心，不要以犧牲國人健康來換取政黨利益。
proposal_en: 1. The import of "Lai" pigs should be strictly controlled: the container or outer packaging of imported pork reprocessed products, mixed products, and food additives should be marked whether it contains ractopamine pork. (Amendments to the Food Safety Act) 2. Implement source management and add specific product numbers: If pork importers import pork containing ractopamine, they should list specific product numbers for identification. (Revision of the Food Safety Law) 3. Labeling of remanufactured products, adding pork additives: Requirements for food labeling, food additives related regulations should be added to indicate whether pork containing ractopamine is used (revision of the Food Safety Law).
title_en: "Standard" Laizhu, protect the food! 1. Strictly control the import of Lai pig 2. Implement source management and add a specific product number 3. Add Lai pig additives on the label of remanufactured products

title_zh: 機場、國道、火車站設置vegan純素餐飲專賣區，尊重並解決多元文化飲食問題，立法列入觀光發展必要措施
proposal_zh:
一. 總統蔡英文提出，希望觀光成為整體經濟發展的火車頭。觀光經濟的發展， 
  
與飲食息息相關，所以一定要解決多元文化的飲食問題.  
  
1.台灣破330萬的素食人口，加上此次疫情，讓更多人為了健康、環保及愛 
  
護動物而吃素。然而補充旅客體力的國道休息區，只有泡麵及乾糧等缺乏營 
  
養的食物充飢，讓出遊易餓肚子及低品質的飲食，無法享受出遊的樂趣，造成素 
  
食人口沒有出門旅遊的意願. 109年1-6月的國外來台旅客全部總合也不過就是 
  
126萬人次，設置純素餐飲專賣區，開發潛在330萬素食人口的國民旅遊市場， 
  
是一個值得的投資。  
  
  
2.疲勞駕駛風險不輸酒駕。疲勞駕駛與長時間睡眠不足、營養失調、壓力過 
  
大所累積的疲勞感有關。交通部應嚴肅正視這個問題，盡可能地降低造成疲 
  
勞駕駛的因素，除了在國道休息區已貼心提供休息設施之外，更要增設純素 
  
餐專賣區，讓吃素的司機補充體力及增加開車專注力，更能省下尋找純素餐 
  
飲的時間，爭取更多休息的時間，降低疲勞駕駛造成的公共危險。 
  
  
3.國際旅遊市場來自各國不同飲食文化的旅客，加上歐美環保意識抬頭，熱愛 
  
vegan純素飲食。政府只推清真認証，並無法解決其他各國旅客的飲食問題 
  
(如網頁連結1-12) 
  
  
二. 政府編列預算鼓勵畜牧業者及處理高碳排動物食品污染。這樣的環保經費支 
  
出，不僅浪費更讓環保沒效率，也是變相的鼓勵高碳排產業，相對對低碳的植物 
  
性食品產業反而不見政府的推廣及補助。 
  
  
三. 建議實施辦法： 
  
1、立法規定於機場、國道休息區及火車站，設置vegan純素餐飲專賣用餐區， 
  
並以多種語言註記為友善穆斯林、友善印度教、友善佛教、友善藏族及vegan純 
  
素等友善字樣。 
  
2、立法將vegan純素餐飲專賣用餐區列入永續觀光發展措施，並加強宣導及廣 
  
告，使國內外素食及多元飲食文化的人口知道有此便民措施。 
  
 3、聯合國環境規畫署提到vegan純素能減低大部分的暖化效應。請環保署落實 
  
溫室氣體減量及管理法第24，27條:a. 提供vegan純素與暖化相關內容之宣 
  
 導，b.提供vegan純素餐飲專賣區獎勵辦法，例如提供補助獎勵金、進駐商家 
  
給予免徵營業稅優惠，並給予租金減免優惠等等。
benefits_zh:
1.對於不同飲食習慣之人民，政府皆能使其享受同等服務，彰顯憲法所保障之平 
  
 等權利。也讓台灣330萬素食人口在盡納稅義務的同時，享有受政府照顧的權 
  
利。 
  
  
2. 降低疲勞駕駛造成的公共危險，保障全台灣人在高速公路上的行車安全。 
  
  
  
3.滿足各國多元文化旅客飲食習慣，讓國外旅客感受台灣的友善及對多元文化的 
  
包容，有助發展國內外旅遊，增加觀光產值。 
  
  
4.優化新南向政策，讓臺灣成為非伊斯蘭合作組織旅遊目的地的第一名。 
  
  
5.讓台灣成為全球第一個從餐桌上做環保的楷模，提高國際環保形象。 
  
  
6.觀光預算的編列已是固定成本，設置vegan 純素餐專賣區解決各國飲食問題 
  
是很大的投資報酬率 
  
  
7.vegan為人們帶來身體健康，讓美麗的地球持續運轉，造就觀光經濟發展，成 
  
為台灣整體經濟發展的火車頭。
proposal_en: 1. President Tsai Ing-wen proposed that tourism should become the locomotive of overall economic development. The development of the tourism economy is closely related to food, so we must solve the problem of multicultural food. 1. Taiwan has a vegetarian population of 3.3 million, and this epidemic has made more people vegetarian for health, environmental protection and caring for animals. However, in the national highway rest area to supplement the physical strength of passengers, there are only instant noodles and dry food to satisfy their hunger, which makes travelers feel hungry and low-quality diet, which makes them unable to enjoy the fun of travel, causing the vegetarian population to have no willingness to travel. The total number of foreign tourists who came to Taiwan from January to June 2019 was only 1.26 million person-times. It is a worthwhile investment to set up a vegan catering area and develop a national tourism market with a potential 3.3 million vegetarian population. 2. The risk of fatigue driving is not inferior to drunk driving. Drowsy driving is related to the accumulated fatigue caused by prolonged sleep deprivation, malnutrition, and excessive stress. The Ministry of Communications should seriously face up to this problem and reduce the factors that cause fatigue driving as much as possible. In addition to providing rest facilities in the rest areas of national highways, it is necessary to add vegan food special areas to allow vegetarian drivers to replenish their physical strength and increase their driving concentration. This will save time looking for vegan food, gain more rest time, and reduce the public danger caused by fatigue driving. 3. In the international tourism market, tourists from different food cultures from various countries, coupled with the rising awareness of environmental protection in Europe and the United States, love vegan diets. The government only promotes halal certification, and cannot solve the dietary problems of tourists from other countries (such as web links 1-12) 2. The government prepares a budget to encourage livestock farmers and deal with high-carbon emission animal food pollution. This kind of expenditure on environmental protection is not only wasteful but also ineffective in environmental protection. It is also a disguised form of encouraging high-carbon emission industries. Compared with the low-carbon plant-based food industry, there is no government promotion and subsidies. 3. Suggested implementation methods: 1. Legislate to set up exclusive vegan dining areas at airports, national highway rest areas and train stations, and mark friendly words such as friendly Muslims, friendly Hinduism, friendly Buddhists, friendly Tibetans and vegan in multiple languages. 2. Legislate to include vegan catering exclusive dining areas in the sustainable tourism development measures, and strengthen publicity and advertisements to let the population of vegetarians and diverse food cultures at home and abroad know that there are such convenient measures. 3. The United Nations Environment Program mentioned that vegan can reduce most of the global warming effect. The Environmental Protection Agency is requested to implement Articles 24 and 27 of the Greenhouse Gas Reduction and Management Act: a. Provide publicity on vegan and global warming, b. Provide incentives for vegan catering exclusive areas, such as providing subsidies and incentives, giving preferential treatment to business tax exemption and rent reduction, etc.
title_en: Airports, national highways, and railway stations set up vegan catering monopoly areas, respect and solve the problem of multicultural diets, and include legislation as a necessary measure for tourism development

BERTLabels: High-Speed Rail Extension to Kaohsiung Station
title_zh: 停止高鐵延長至屏東將經費用於改善台鐵
proposal_zh: 前幾年各縣市增建機場，屏東之前也跟著建機場，最終因為客流量不足而停飛，為避免重蹈覆轍浪費公帑，與其花5、6百萬元將高鐵變成台鐵，何不將經費用於改善故障頻繁的台鐵。
benefits_zh: 目前台鐵高雄至屏東平均半小時有一班以上列車，車程約25分鐘左右，市區觀光效應並不會因為縮短10幾分鐘車程而出現，何不將經費用在改善台鐵營運，將台鐵營運品質接近高鐵，全台都能得利．
proposal_en: Several counties and cities built additional airports in the past few years, and Pingtung also followed suit. Finally, flights were grounded due to insufficient passenger flow. To avoid repeating the same mistakes and wasting public money, instead of spending 5 to 6 million yuan to turn the high-speed rail into Taiwan Railway, why not spend the funds on improving the Taiwan Railway, which is frequently malfunctioning.
title_en: Stop the high-speed rail extension to Pingtung and use the funds to improve the Taiwan Railway

title_zh: 應修改【幼兒教育及照顧法】之相關罰則細項，以利加強幼兒托育安全。
proposal_zh:
緣由 
•有鑑於幼兒園違規事件層出不窮，但礙於罰則過低，無法有效喝止幼兒園業者違法之現況，然而台灣公幼數與私幼數完全不成正比，絕大多數民眾只能夠選擇私立幼兒園進行托育。 
•綜合以上，為保護幼兒與民眾在私幼的權益及安全，應改善【幼兒教育及照顧法】（以下簡稱幼照法）之罰則與修改細項。 
  
提案相關建議 
 •針對「招收人數超過設立許可核定招收人數」 
「招收人數超過設立許可核定招收人數」，是常見的嚴重性違法，幼生可能在稽查時會被業者帶出幼兒園躲藏甚至是藏在沒有安全考量的密閉空間，對幼兒安全極為危險，且「超收學生」是業者完全可控卻抱持僥倖心態的預謀性違法，據【幼照法】第 49 條，第一次僅罰六千，最高罰鍰只有三萬，導致業者根本不害怕，甚至只需多收一名幼生，不法所得就能打平罰鍰。 
  
建議修法 
1.提高罰緩與增加裁罰方式，初犯罰鍰應提高至三十萬元或不法所得的三倍，限期未改善應加罰三百萬，經處罰三次仍未改善改者得罰五百萬，並直接廢止設立許可。 
2.「超收學生」為嚴重違法，應按照【行政罰法】第18條，所得之利益超過法定罰鍰最高額者，得於所得利益之範圍內酌量加重，不受法定罰鍰最高額之限制。 
3.應將超收學生所賺取之不法所得全數退回民眾。 
4.【幼照法】第37條應將書面申請方式修改為不須申請並強制退回全園幼生當學期所有已繳費用，以維護民眾權益。 
  
•針對「體罰、性騷擾、不當管教」 
兒虐事件造成的影響不需多作闡述，但【幼照法】第46條目前僅針對行為人與負責人處以罰鍰，應提高對業者之處分以利喝止業者強化對幼師之管理，達到加強幼兒受教及安全品質。 
  
建議修法 
1.提高罰鍰下限與增加裁罰方式，「不當體罰、性騷擾」若查證屬實，行為人與負責人應提高罰鍰為最低五十萬元以上一百萬元以下罰鍰。 
2.「不當管教」若查證屬實，行為人與負責人應提高罰鍰為最低十萬元以上五十萬元以下罰鍰。 
  
•針對【幼照法】第七章之罰則 
私立幼兒園違規數每年各縣市加總約有上百件，且以私立業者為大宗，應全面調整裁罰方式，以遏止業者輕視罰則，達到有效保護幼兒與維護民眾權益之效。 
  
 建議修法 
1.所有罰鍰應全面提高調整為三萬至十萬元，並比照酒駕罰則，若改善後任一項違規五年內第二次再犯，應直接處最高罰鍰並加罰三十萬元。 
2.針對【幼照法】49條第八項應比照【行政罰法】第18條的裁罰考量，將【幼照法】49條加入「不法所得之利益超過法定罰鍰最高額者，得於所得利益之範圍內酌量加重，不受法定罰鍰最高額之限制，並將不法所得全數退回民眾」之條文。
benefits_zh:
幼童為未來國家棟樑，而本國雖有多項幼兒福利同時政策進行，但公幼、非營利園所數依舊嚴重少於一般私幼數量。 
正因為絕大多數幼童都只能選擇私幼托育，若是無法改善違法只能輕罰之問題，那幼童安全將無法得到有效的保護。 
倘若這次提案與修改能夠順利成功，必能帶動幼兒園守法之良善風氣，並能大幅提高幼童安全與就學品質，減少幼童、民眾因園所違法而權益受損之情況。 
唯有嚴苛的法規標準，才能讓國內私立幼兒園品質達到真正的改善，遏止業者因龐大利益而罔顧幼兒安全之常態，並有效提高本國之幼教環境安全。
proposal_en: Reasons • In view of the endless incidents of violations in kindergartens, the penalties are too low to effectively curb the violations of kindergarten operators. However, the number of public and private kindergartens in Taiwan is completely disproportionate, and the vast majority of people can only choose private kindergartens for childcare. • To sum up, in order to protect the rights and safety of young children and the public in private children, the penalties and amendment details of the [Early Childhood Education and Care Act] (hereinafter referred to as the Child Care Act) should be improved. Suggestions related to the proposal •Aiming at "enrolling more than the number approved by the establishment permit" and "enrolling more than the approved number approved by the establishment permit", it is a common serious violation. During the inspection, young students may be taken out of the kindergarten by the operator to hide or even hide in a closed space without safety considerations. There is only 30,000 yuan, so the operators are not afraid at all, and even only need to charge one more young student, and the illegal income can equal the fine. Suggested Law Amendment 1. Improve fine suspension and increase penalties. The fine for the first offense should be increased to 300,000 yuan or three times the illegal income. If the improvement is not made within the time limit, the penalty should be increased to 3 million. Those who have not improved after three punishments will be fined 5 million, and the establishment license will be directly revoked. 2. "Over-enrollment of students" is a serious violation of the law and shall be in accordance with Article 18 of the [Administrative Penalty Law]. If the benefits obtained exceed the maximum legal penalty, the penalty may be increased within the scope of the benefits obtained, and is not subject to the maximum legal penalty. 3. All illegal income earned by over-enrolled students should be returned to the public. 4. 【Youth Photo Law】Article 37 should modify the written application method to no need to apply and force all kindergarten students to return all paid fees for the current semester to protect the rights and interests of the public. •There is no need to elaborate on the impact of "corporal punishment, sexual harassment, and improper discipline" child abuse incidents, but Article 46 of the [Child Care Law] currently only imposes fines on the perpetrators and responsible persons, and should increase the punishment of the operators to facilitate the industry to strengthen the management of kindergarten teachers, so as to enhance children's education and safety quality. Suggested amendments 1. Increase the lower limit of fines and increase the methods of punishment. If "inappropriate corporal punishment and sexual harassment" is verified to be true, the perpetrator and the person in charge should increase the fine to a minimum of 500,000 to 1,000,000. 2. If "improper discipline" is verified to be true, the perpetrator and the person in charge should increase the fine to a minimum of 100,000 to 500,000 yuan. •Penalties for Chapter VII of the [Child Care Law] The number of violations by private kindergartens in each county and city totals about hundreds of cases each year, and the majority of them are private operators. The penalty method should be fully adjusted to prevent the operators from underestimating the penalty rules, and to effectively protect children and safeguard the rights and interests of the public. Suggested Amendments 1. All fines should be adjusted to 30,000 to 100,000 yuan in an all-round way, and according to the drunk driving penalty, if any violation is committed again within five years after improvement, the maximum fine and an additional fine of 300,000 yuan should be imposed directly. 2. Regarding item 8 of Article 49 of the [Youth Photo Law], the penalty considerations in Article 18 of the [Administrative Penalty Law] should be considered, and Article 49 of the [Youth Photo Law] should be added to the article that "if the illegally obtained benefits exceed the maximum legal penalty, the penalty may be increased within the scope of the obtained benefits.
title_en: Relevant fine details of the [Early Childhood Education and Care Act] should be amended in order to enhance the safety of childcare.

title_zh: 限制核課時效，保障納稅人權
proposal_zh:
【建議事項】 
  
「納保法」第21條第4項之規定應回歸「行政程序法」及「稅捐稽徵法」等行政法之體制，修正為「自課稅處分做成後，五年內未能確定應納稅額者，不得再行核課。」並增列第5項「本條修正前尚未確定應納稅額之救濟與訴訟進行中案件，亦追溯適用之」。 
  
【說明】 
  
一、我國獨有的萬年稅單問題，為人民帶來無限痛苦，這也是專家學者均認為最嚴重的稅務問題。立法院在105年12月9日三讀審查通過「納稅者權利保護法」（下稱「納保法」），其中第21條第4項之立法目的是為解決「萬年稅單」問題，並避免因執法不當而對人民之財產權及自由權造成侵害，然而通過之條文並無法解決問題。因為該規定設下了嚴苛的條件。根據此法，若納稅人收到錯誤稅單，不服而提出行政救濟，必須符合下面的標準，才能援用該法條終結冤稅： 
 (1)「納保法」施行(106.12.28)後，受法院撤銷或變更的案子才算，施行前被撤銷或變更的案子皆不能適用。 
 (2)受到法院撤銷或變更裁判後，還要加上15年期間都一直沒辦法確定稅額。 
 (3)納稅人不可以故意延滯訴訟，或發生甚麼其他不可抗力的事由。 
  
二、上述看起來似乎在保障納稅者的權利，但魔鬼藏在細節中，因為： 
(1) 不論案件歷時多久，也不管「納保法」施行之前已經法院撤銷，一切都不算，都要等「納保法」『施行後』，再一次經過行政法院判決撤銷課稅處分後，才可以『開始』起算15年，換句話，人民最快要等到民國121年（106年+15年）才有機會解脫萬年稅單桎梏，而且必須經過15年沒有任何敗訴，且無法確定應納稅額，才不得再核課。 
(2) 有爭議的稅單歷經復查、訴願及進入行政法院審理的時間完全都不計入時效。 
(3) 法律對時效的規定有幾項：「行政程序法」規定公法上的請求權因五年間不行使而消滅；「稅捐稽徵法」依規定申報稅捐核課期間為5年。連殺人放火的案件，「刑事妥速審判法」也規定8年內要完成訴訟。然而，行政救濟的期限，依據相關法律的規定，從復查到行政法院判決，為時大概2年；再加上「納保法」規定15年，稅案爭訟甚至極可能拖到 20年以上！若收到一張錯誤稅單，得花上這麼長的時間解決，根本無法達到保護納稅人權利的效果，對人民財產權是一大傷害，更將造成企業倒閉或出走，外資不敢來台，阻礙國家整體的經濟發展。 
(4)「納保法」規定的15年時效，相較於「刑事妥速審判法」、「行政執行法」、「刑法」、「行政程序法」及稅捐稽徵法等法律所規定的時效是最長的，且時效的起算日及期間都比刑事案件的時效規定更嚴苛。
benefits_zh:
一、時效制度之目的，在督促權利人行使權利，而「稅捐稽徵法」已規定核課期間為五年(最長七年)，也就是法律本來給稅捐機關調查核稅的時間就是五年，稅捐機關掌握各項資源及調查權，於發單前，本來就有充分的時間依職權調查，稅捐機關沒有查明事實就發出稅單，本就已經違法，而違法處分被法院撤銷後，更應該積極在最短時間，就有無課稅要件事實調查清楚，豈有再給15年慢慢調查、重複一再發單的道理？況且這段延宕的時間所產生的利息，必須由納稅人負擔。 
  
二、大部分的「萬年稅單」，多源自稅捐稽徵機關的怠惰且未依職權調查即發單課稅，再加上行政救濟制度失靈，而行政法院無法做出終局判決所造成。「納保法」的立法目的既為落實憲法生存權、工作權、財產權及其他相關基本權利之保障，確保納稅者權利。則對於納保法施行前就已經發生但仍未確定的案件，其不利益，不應歸由納稅人一概承受苦果。 
  
三、「納保法」對於時效的規定，讓人民完全無法受到時效利益的保障。故提案儘速修法，以落實憲法及國際人權兩公約有效救濟的人權保障。
proposal_en: [Suggestions] Article 21, Item 4 of the "National Insurance Law" should return to the administrative law system such as the "Administrative Procedure Law" and "Tax Collection Law", and amend it to "If the tax payable cannot be determined within five years after the taxation action is completed, no further tax assessment shall be made." Add item 5 "The relief and litigation cases that have not yet determined the tax payable before the amendment of this article shall also be applied retroactively." [Explanation] 1. The unique ten-thousand-year tax bill problem in our country has brought infinite pain to the people. This is also the most serious tax problem that experts and scholars believe. On December 9, 2015, the Legislative Yuan passed the "Taxpayer Rights Protection Law" (hereinafter referred to as the "Natural Security Law") after the third reading review. The legislative purpose of Article 21, Item 4 is to solve the problem of "ten thousand year tax bills" and to avoid infringement of people's property rights and freedom rights due to improper law enforcement. However, the passed provisions cannot solve the problem. Because the regulations set strict conditions. According to this law, if a taxpayer receives a wrong tax bill and refuses to accept it and proposes administrative relief, the following criteria must be met before the law can be invoked to end the unjust tax: (1) After the implementation of the "National Insurance Law" (106.12.28), only cases that have been revoked or changed by the court are counted, and cases that have been revoked or changed before the implementation cannot be applied. (2) After being revoked or changed by the court, the tax amount has not been determined for 15 years. (3) The taxpayer may not intentionally delay the lawsuit, or any other cause of force majeure. 2. The above seems to be protecting the rights of taxpayers, but the devil is hidden in the details, because: (1) No matter how long the case lasts, and no matter how long the case has been revoked by the court before the implementation of the "Baobao Law", nothing will be counted. It will not be counted until "after the implementation" of the "Baobao Law" and the administrative court once again revokes the tax penalty. After 15 years without any loss, and the amount of tax payable cannot be determined, the class shall not be re-examined. (2) The time for disputed tax bills to go through review, appeal and enter the administrative court is not included in the statute of limitations at all. (3) There are several legal provisions on the statute of limitations: the "Administrative Procedure Law" stipulates that the right of claim in public law will be extinguished if it is not exercised within five years; Even for homicide and arson cases, the "Criminal Prompt Trial Act" stipulates that the lawsuit must be completed within 8 years. However, the period of administrative relief, according to relevant laws, is about 2 years from the review to the judgment of the administrative court; in addition to the 15 years stipulated in the "Natural Security Law", the tax dispute may even drag on for more than 20 years! If a wrong tax bill is received, it will take such a long time to resolve it. It will not achieve the effect of protecting the rights of taxpayers. It will be a great harm to the property rights of the people. It will also cause business closures or leave. Foreign investors will not dare to come to Taiwan, hindering the overall economic development of the country. (4) The 15-year statute of limitations stipulated in the "Natural Security Law" is the longest compared with the statutes of limitations stipulated in the "Criminal Prompt Trial Law", "Administrative Enforcement Law", "Criminal Law", "Administrative Procedure Law" and Tax Collection Law, and the starting date and duration of the statute of limitations are stricter than the statute of limitations in criminal cases.
title_en: Limit the statute of limitations and protect the human rights of taxpayers

title_zh: 短程目標：推動便利超商保障蔬/素食熟食品供應比例規範　長程：後續推動蔬食產業發
proposal_zh:
主訴求「保障蔬/素食人口食的權益滿足」、後續推動蔬/素食產業文化發展：
 
 
1.制定便利商店熟食規範或勸導/獎勵性政策，於提供之熟食產品中須有建議比例之無肉性食品(例：方便素需占10%、全素5%、蛋奶素5%)
 
2.輔導畜牧、漁業產業轉型，發展更多食材多元方向，(避免肉食族群減少後帶來的產業消費衝擊、降低抗爭及爭議性)
 
3.設立蔬食餐飲業補助辦法，以鼓勵成立無肉性便當或外食產品的購買場所 (註：因蔬食餐飲業之販售對象並不若一般葷素餐飲對象普及，因此對營業成本是相當壓力，但現仍可見相當多地區方圓數里內無蔬食產品可選擇，使蔬食者食的權益毫無保障性，此目的為希望保障各地區、區里間都能滿足蔬食外食者「食」的基本需求)
 
4. 蔬食之合理性宣導，強化國人「(食)不浪費、(彼此飲食習慣)不歧視、不對立」互相尊重的葷、蔬食人口 正向飲食觀念
benefits_zh:
保障蔬食族群「食」的權益，也開發刺激新的「蔬食產業商機」
輔導產業結構調整，減少國內禽畜畜牧、漁業超量之情形，逐步減少不健康或高密集度的「不人道」畜牧過程
建請階段式規劃、發展蔬食文化之相關系列政策，完整配套，讓台灣成為一個能接受多元飲食觀念、且皆能滿足不同葷素飲食習慣者需求的優秀進步國家
 
1. 純素主義者（Vegan）： 摒棄動物肉（肉、家禽、魚和海鮮），動物製品（蛋和奶製品）通常也不吃蜂蜜和不穿動物製品（真皮、絲綢、羊毛、羊毛脂、明膠...)。
proposal_en: The main appeal is to "ensure the satisfaction of the dietary rights and interests of the vegetarian/vegetarian population" and follow-up to promote the cultural development of the vegetable/vegetarian industry: 1. Formulate cooked food norms or persuasion/reward policies in convenience stores, and the cooked food products provided must have the recommended proportion of meat-free food (for example: convenience vegetarians need to account for 10%, vegan 5%, egg-lactate 5%) 2. Counseling the transformation of animal husbandry and fishery industries, and developing more diversified directions for food materials (avoiding the impact of industrial consumption after the reduction of meat-eating groups, reducing resistance and controversy) 3. Establishing a vegetarian food Subsidy measures for the catering industry to encourage the establishment of places to buy meat-free bento or out-of-home products (Note: The sales targets of the vegetable-based catering industry are not as popular as those of the general meat-and-vegetarian catering industry, so it puts considerable pressure on operating costs, but it can still be seen that there are quite a few areas within a few miles. No waste, (eating habits) no discrimination, no confrontation" Mutual respect for the meat and vegetable population Positive eating concept
title_en: Short-term goal: promote convenience supermarkets to ensure the supply ratio of vegetable/vegetarian cooked food Long-term: follow-up to promote the development of the vegetable and food industry

title_zh: 全面檢視「前瞻計畫」
proposal_zh:
前瞻基礎建設計畫（以下簡稱前瞻計畫）費時8年動用中央政府特別預算8,800億元，是國家重大建設，影響國家經濟發展、人民生活深遠。 
　 然而，前瞻計畫推出之後，成為多方質疑焦點。我們也觀察到以下問題： 
  
 
 政府的決策權責不清 
 準備時間倉促 
 前瞻視野不足，偏重工程 
 預防公共工程的弊病不夠深切 
 預算編列草率 
 公民參與不足 
 
因此，從消極面，為免浪費國家有限的資源、避免給下一代造成沉重的債務負擔；從積極面，提升台灣經濟下一步的競爭力，因此我們希望借助這次重大的建設計畫，來改善國家治理的困境，突破中央各部會之間以及中央與地方之間的本位主義。　 
基於以上，我們提出以下主張： 
  
一，就前瞻條例的部份　　 
請立法院仔細檢查並修改以下內容： 
 
 範圍：不應只是工程建設 
 建立平台，讓所有資訊透明 
 審議的程序，要求每個項目都做完整的效益評估 
 公眾參與，讓利害關係人有表達意見的機會 
 配合國土計畫並著重生態優先 
 加入退場機制，讓通不過的項目淘汰 
 加入究責條款 
 
二，就前瞻計畫的部份 
  
請行政院編列前瞻計畫各項目的相關部會，就其所提各個計畫及預算的編列，詳細說明以下內容，並送立法院審議： 
 
 該計畫項目立案之原由及背景。該計畫項目如果由先前某計畫變更而來，說明其原由。 
 該計畫項目所需預算？錢從哪裡來？中央與地方分配之比例？ 
 該計畫項目的目的及效益？ 
 該計畫有否進行社會影響評估？ 
 該計畫有沒有可以配合或替代的非工程手段？ 
 該計畫有沒有過往類似的成功或失敗案例以供借鏡？ 
 該計畫預期創造的就業機會
benefits_zh:
我們希望政府能以這次前瞻計畫所引發的大量公共討論為契機，吸納社會的建議，擘畫施政的新局，也為國家開創新的未來。

　　　　 台灣閒置公共設施踏查計畫發起人 ） 
徐世榮 （政大地政學系教授） 
郝明義 （大塊文化董事長）

proposer: 全面檢視前瞻計畫連署人
proposal_en: The forward-looking infrastructure construction plan (hereinafter referred to as the forward-looking plan) took 8 years and used the special budget of the central government of 880 billion yuan. It is a major national construction and has a profound impact on the country's economic development and people's lives. However, after the forward-looking plan was launched, it became the focus of many doubts. We have also observed the following problems: The government’s decision-making powers and responsibilities are unclear, the preparation time is short, the forward-looking vision is insufficient, and the emphasis on engineering is not deep enough to prevent the ills of public works. The budgeting is sloppy and the citizens’ participation is insufficient. Based on the above, we propose the following propositions: 1. Regarding the forward-looking regulations, please carefully review and revise the following contents: Scope: Not just engineering construction. Establish a platform to make all information transparent. The review process requires a complete benefit evaluation for each project. Relevant ministries and committees of each project shall detail the following contents regarding the compilation of each plan and budget proposed by them, and submit them to the Legislative Yuan for deliberation: The reason and background of the filing of the project. If the plan item is changed from a previous plan, explain the reason. What is the budget required for this project? Where does the money come from? The ratio of central and local distribution? What are the objectives and benefits of the project? Has the project had a social impact assessment? Are there any non-engineering alternatives to the program that could complement or replace it? Are there any similar successes or failures of the program in the past for reference? Job opportunities expected to be created by the project
title_en: A comprehensive review of the "Forward Plan"

title_zh: 希望教育部即刻實施大學.高中.國小遠端教學
proposal_zh: 一開始政府宣傳說健康的人不用帶口罩，但隨疫情的變化，變成到公部門機構要帶口罩，然後變成4/1號開始搭乘交通工具都一定要帶口罩，隨後疫情指揮中心宣佈要保持社交距離室外1公尺.室內1.5公尺，而且還有本土案例找不到感染源，這些都證明台灣的疫情越來越嚴重，希望教育部能盡快宣佈遠端教學，教室本身就小而且外縣市通勤要搭乘一堆交通工具，到時萬一有大學生確診到時光是疫調就是大工程！其實以台灣的科技要遠端教學技術上沒問題，是要不要宣佈的問題！
benefits_zh: 授教權跟健康權，我認為健康權優先授教全
proposal_en: At the beginning, the government advertised that healthy people do not need to wear masks, but as the epidemic situation changed, it became mandatory to wear masks in public sector institutions, and then it became mandatory to wear masks when taking transportation from 4/1. Then the epidemic command center announced that social distance should be maintained at 1 meter outside and 1.5 meters indoors, and there are local cases where the source of infection cannot be found. Tuning is a big project! In fact, with Taiwan's technology, there is no problem with remote teaching technology, it is a question of whether to announce it!
title_en: I hope that the Ministry of Education will immediately implement remote teaching for universities, high schools, and elementary schools

title_zh: 取消由健保署訂定自付差額醫材上限
proposal_zh:
健保署6月8日公告，依健保法第45條訂定特約院所收取差額上限，然而院所收取差額為民眾自付之醫療費用，與健保給付無關，不應交由健保署訂定。 
  
依據醫療法第21條，醫療機構收取醫療費用之標準，由直轄市、縣 (市) 主管機關核定之。醫療費用之收取已有直轄市、縣 (市) 主管機關，也就是各縣市衛生局訂定之醫療機構收費標準做為管制，民眾不會因為沒有健保署制訂的差額上限就花冤枉錢，且由各縣市個別訂定更能依照不同縣市生活水平、經營成本做出更適合的訂價標準。 
  
因此建請健保署取消訂定自付差額醫材上限，或更進一步請立法院修法刪除健保法第45條由健保署訂定特約院所收取差額上限之條文。
benefits_zh:
即便健保署公告定價是有依照功能類別區分價位，但其分類標準無法完全適用醫療現況，附圖以健保署發佈於臉書平台之圖片為例，圖中列出15個品項的人工水晶體只有3個品項符合核定費用以內，顯見其核定價格的基準與市場之脫節，健保署如此把關方式如何能讓民眾信任篩選出的是真的功效良好的醫材還是只能低價競爭的次級品？ 
  
圖中若改以汽車舉例，相信民眾都能輕易理解制訂上限後的後果。 
  
此政策實施後可預見較高價格品質功能較佳之醫材退出台灣市場之未來，而低於核定價格之品項還可藉此合理漲價至核定價，損及民眾就醫權益。故建請健保署取消訂定保險醫事服務機構得收取差額之上限，保留民眾自費選擇醫療品質的權力。
proposal_en: The National Health Insurance Administration announced on June 8 that in accordance with Article 45 of the National Health Insurance Law, the upper limit of the difference charged by special institutions is set. However, the difference collected by institutions is the medical expenses paid by the public, which has nothing to do with the health insurance payment and should not be determined by the National Health Insurance Administration. According to Article 21 of the Medical Law, the standard of medical fees charged by medical institutions shall be approved by the municipal and county (city) competent authorities. The collection of medical expenses has been controlled by the municipal and county (city) competent authorities, that is, the medical institution charging standards set by the county and city health bureaus. People will not waste money because they do not have the upper limit of the difference set by the National Health Insurance Department. Moreover, the individual counties and cities can make more suitable pricing standards according to the living standards and operating costs of different counties and cities. Therefore, it is recommended that the National Health Insurance Administration abolish the upper limit of self-paid medical equipment, or further request the Legislative Yuan to amend the law to delete Article 45 of the National Health Insurance Law, which requires the National Health Insurance Administration to set the upper limit of the difference that special hospitals can collect.
title_en: Cancellation of the self-payment limit for medical equipment set by the National Health Insurance Department

title_zh: 反對國家公園登山活動安全管理條例草案、臺中市、南投縣登山活動管理自治條例的不合理登山管制與罰則
proposal_zh:
最近因為登山意外事故搜救問題，讓政府開始注意登山活動的管理，但是在制定管理辦法時，卻忽視本土登山文化脈絡與登山者在野外的真實處境，全然以「浪費國家搜救資源」的思維看待登山意外。雖然有些登山意外是人為不當處置導致，但是登山意外事件通常還是有多重因素如：天候、落石、溪水暴漲、動物攻擊等無法控制的自然因素引發，所以許多的登山者是在了解野外風險的情況下，努力將自已的體能、裝備、技術與知識準備好才步入山林的，也清楚認知自己可能會在無法有外部救援的情況下從事登山，因此對自身及隊員的安全是完全負責的態度。
但是目前我們從時代力量黨團提案之『國家公園登山活動安全管理條例草案』與經台中市議會三讀且已送行政院報核之『臺中市登山活動管理自治條例』與南投縣審查的『南投縣登山活動管理自治條例草案』中看到，現在所提出的登山管理政策，根本無法達到降低山難發生的目標，而只在強調由上而下的管制及對人民施以處罰，政令不只是限制野外知能豐富的登山者，更縮限登山活動未來發展的空間，甚至阻礙本土自然文化的深耕。
 
以「浪費國家搜救資源」看待登山意外，未正視山域救護系統的重要性
登山活動不僅在山地管制時期提供人民接觸自然土地的機會，更保留台灣自然探索精神。當世界趨勢正朝向去尋求人與自然可以和諧共存而鼓勵戶外生活的今日，台灣政策卻欲倒退而行，縮限登山自由，繼續封山管制。
台灣山域面積廣幅，長期以來政府卻沒有針對台灣環境特性建構山域救護系統的發展。城市發生意外可以請救護車、消防隊協助，但是當民眾在山區發生意外了，現在卻被冠上「浪費國家搜救資源」，以此角度看待登山活動，政府就不用正視缺弱的山域救護系統嗎？甚至繼續以限制和處罰的模式，透過縮限登山活動來消極面對。
 
封閉步道、禁入荒野，限制人民自由
登山活動中除了徒步健行是利用固定步道為多以外，登山的山野探勘、溯溪等多半是在無固定路徑的荒野和溪谷活動，也就是非步道的野地。有時熟悉山區地形的經驗登山者是基於提升登山步道的安全性，才戮力開闢新路線。「禁止自行闢路」的規定等同於禁止人民走進荒野。山域活動政策制定應該需要由原住民、登山者與自然保育團體及主管機關協議入山管理規定。如果為了登山活動安全管理，政策應該建立的是登山行程計畫登記報備系統，而不應該是封閉步道和禁止自闢路徑，並在不明究理的情況下處罰登山者。
 
個人無法投保登山保險，違反個人登山自由，也罔顧人民基本權
基於憲法第十五條人民生存權的保障及消防法第十六條課予各級消防機關統籌指揮、調度、管制及聯繫救災、救護相關事宜之義務，國家依據憲法及相關法律事實本對人民有救護義務。基於此，即便本條例草案要求保險且原則上以保險金來支付，但如果保險機制不夠完整，「違反基本權保障」之疑慮就會存在。
現行登山保險只有團體保險，個人無法投保，若規定登山要辦理登山強制保險，但是只有多人的登山隊伍可以投保，這不止違反個人登山自由，也罔顧人民基本權。
 
規定與罰則內容，不會減少山難肇因
領隊具備救護證書是否就一定能減少山難？可有相關研究評估過？若無如何判定這將是對登山安全有效的管制方式？強要領隊具備此等證明並設定罰則意義為何？
 
關於雪季期間應攜帶的雪攀裝備，除了條文中有部分裝備可能不敷安全之虞外，由於活動的地點區域或類型模式等不盡相同，條文中的裝備是否為必需而一定要攜帶，實也有相當大的爭議。
benefits_zh:
目前登山活動管理條例與草案皆忽視登山文化與登山者的真實處境，必需重新研擬，並依正義原則去顧慮人民的安全與自由權的保障，並非只在對人民進行管制及處罰。制定如此攸關登山活動發展之法規，更需要透過公開的過程邀請或徵集如：教育部體育署等相關主管機關參與；並且徵求或聽取各登山團體，乃至於從事登山活動的廣大民眾的意見，不應該匆促上路。
在登山安全管理上，政府應該先推動專責山域搜救系統發展。登山保險若要強制投保，不應限制投保人數門檻，將一人登山者納入投保對象。
proposal_en: Recently, due to the problem of search and rescue of mountaineering accidents, the government has begun to pay attention to the management of mountaineering activities. However, when formulating management methods, it ignores the local mountaineering cultural context and the real situation of climbers in the wild, and treats mountaineering accidents with the thinking of "wasting national search and rescue resources". Although some mountaineering accidents are caused by human mishandling, mountaineering accidents are usually caused by multiple factors such as weather, falling rocks, surging streams, animal attacks and other uncontrollable natural factors. Therefore, many climbers step into the mountains after understanding the risks in the wild and working hard to prepare their own physical fitness, equipment, technology and knowledge. They also clearly understand that they may engage in mountaineering without external rescue. However, we can see from the "Regulations on the Safety Management of Mountaineering Activities in National Parks" proposed by the Times Power Party Group, the "Regulations on the Autonomous Management of Mountaineering Activities in Taichung City" that was read by the Taichung City Council for the third time and submitted to the Executive Yuan for approval, and the "Regulations on the Autonomous Management of Mountaineering Activities in Nantou County" reviewed by Nantou County. This limits the space for the future development of mountaineering activities, and even hinders the deep cultivation of local natural culture. Viewing mountaineering accidents as a "waste of national search and rescue resources" does not take seriously the importance of the mountain rescue system. Mountaineering activities not only provide people with opportunities to contact natural land during the mountain control period, but also preserve Taiwan's spirit of natural exploration. Today, when the world trend is looking for a harmonious coexistence between man and nature and encouraging outdoor life, Taiwan's policy is going backwards, limiting the freedom of climbing, and continuing to close the mountain. Taiwan's mountainous area is vast, but the government has not developed a mountain rescue system according to Taiwan's environmental characteristics for a long time. In the event of an accident in a city, ambulances and fire brigades can be called for assistance, but when people have accidents in mountainous areas, they are now labeled as "wasting national search and rescue resources". Looking at mountaineering activities from this perspective, does the government not have to face up to the weak mountain rescue system? Even continue to use the mode of restriction and punishment, and face it negatively by reducing the limit of mountaineering activities. Closed trails, prohibiting access to wilderness, and restricting people's free climbing activities. In addition to hiking and hiking, most of them use fixed trails. Most mountaineering mountaineering activities such as mountain exploration and river tracing are carried out in wilderness and valleys without fixed paths, that is, wild lands that are not trails. Sometimes experienced climbers who are familiar with the mountainous terrain make efforts to open new routes based on improving the safety of hiking trails. The regulation of "prohibiting self-made roads" is equivalent to prohibiting people from going into the wilderness. The formulation of policies for mountain activities should require the aboriginal people, climbers, nature conservation groups and competent authorities to agree on mountain management regulations. For the safety management of mountaineering activities, the policy should establish a registration and reporting system for mountaineering itinerary plans, rather than closing trails and prohibiting self-creating paths, and punishing climbers for unreasonable circumstances. Individuals cannot purchase mountaineering insurance, which violates personal freedom of mountaineering, and ignores the basic rights of the people. Based on the protection of the people’s right to life in Article 15 of the Constitution and the obligation of fire departments at all levels to coordinate command, dispatch, control, and contact disaster relief and rescue related matters in Article 16 of the Fire Protection Law, the state has an obligation to rescue the people in accordance with the Constitution and relevant legal facts. Based on this, even though the Bill requires insurance and in principle it is paid with insurance money, if the insurance mechanism is not complete, there will be concerns about "violating the protection of fundamental rights". The current mountaineering insurance is only group insurance, and individuals cannot purchase insurance. If it is stipulated that mountaineering must apply for compulsory mountaineering insurance, but only a multi-person mountaineering team can insure, this not only violates the freedom of individuals to climb mountains, but also ignores the fundamental rights of the people. The content of regulations and penalties will not reduce mountain disasters, because the team leader has an ambulance certificate, will it definitely reduce mountain disasters? Have relevant research been evaluated? If not, how to judge that this will be a safe and effective control method for mountaineering? What is the significance of forcing the team leader to have such certificates and setting penalties? Regarding the snow climbing equipment that should be carried during the snow season, in addition to the risk that some equipment in the provisions may not be safe enough, due to the different areas or types of activities, there is actually considerable controversy about whether the equipment in the provisions is necessary and must be carried.
title_en: Oppose the National Park Mountaineering Activities Safety Management Bill, Taichung City, Nantou County Mountaineering Activities Management Autonomous Regulations Unreasonable Mountaineering Controls and Penalties

title_zh: 獸醫得合法使用人藥醫治動物，動物之醫療應由獸醫專業把關
proposal_zh:
動物使用人藥在世界先進國家皆屬正常，此為動物福祉，是世界為保護動物用藥權及人類健康的（One World One Health）共享世界共享健康的潮流，且已在台灣行之有年，不得受到剝奪或損害。 
 應修改藥事法33、50條，將獸醫診療機構加入可出貨對象，動物醫療權不得因利益之爭受到影響，不得禁止合法藥物買賣輸送至獸醫院。 
 獸醫對於動物專業應受重視，獸醫有合法權力使用人藥醫治動物。 
 動物醫療屬獸醫專業，動物醫療計畫及用藥應由獸醫主導，反對動物醫藥調劑權釋出給對於動物病理全無專業之藥師。
benefits_zh:
分析世界先進國家獸醫師使用藥物狀況，70%皆是人用藥，單純動物用藥僅占30%，此乃動物醫院常態的藥物使用比率；而目前許多動物之必要藥品（如化療用藥）缺乏專為動物開發之用藥，人藥用於動物醫療，不但是先進國家允許的，也是目前臺灣行之有年且合法的；這屬動物福祉，不得受到剝奪或損害。假若禁止人藥買賣輸送給獸醫院，會使得臺灣的經濟動物（如牛羊豬狗魚雞）、寵物（如貓狗蜥蜴貂鳥…）都陷入醫療荒漠之中，無藥可醫。 
 因應GPD上路，不該因此犧牲動物醫療權益，不得因此反向禁止藥商向獸醫院輸送及販賣人藥，而是完善法條，修改藥事法33條、50條，將獸醫診療機構加入可出貨對象。 
 動物更會因為物種、體型、年齡、體格等需要不同醫療計畫，醫療計畫與用藥難以分割，更會隨著病情變化、甚至藥物過敏等情況需要隨時調整用藥，若急症時還需要另至藥局取藥，將會失去治療的黃金時刻。且藥師毫無動物生理病理專業，如何開藥？如何指教飼主用藥、餵藥？有些人藥雖可互相取代，但每樣物種有不同的身病理，藥師全無此方面知識，若因藥局因缺藥、而藥師另外拿取對該動物有毒性的藥物取代，輕者致病重者喪命，動物生命只能枉死，誰來負責？ 
 動物診療為獸醫專業，臺灣在日治時期即開始發展獸醫專業，更於民國32年成立獸醫科系，當時獨步亞洲，台灣獸醫師的醫療專業不應受漠視，動物醫療計畫應由獸醫師把關。 
 目前動物病歷通常需在同一家獸醫院長期建立，才能有較精準的治療方針，不像人類有雲端病歷；且動物不會說話，需要長期與同一位獸醫培養診療默契，醫藥分家只會使動物治療加倍困難，大大提高誤診機率。 
 以現行體制來說，禁止獸醫合法使用人藥醫治動物，此對於動物、飼主、獸醫師並無益處，僅對藥師有益，若貿然單方面聽從藥師公會，是否有圖利特定團體之嫌？若要增進動物醫療健康之福祉，應由健全動物相關法條著手，不得禁止獸醫使用人藥醫治動物。
proposal_en: It is normal for animals to use human medicine in advanced countries in the world. This is for the welfare of animals. It is the trend of the world to protect animal medicine rights and human health (One World One Health). It has been practiced in Taiwan for many years and must not be deprived or damaged. Articles 33 and 50 of the Pharmaceutical Affairs Law should be amended to include veterinary medical institutions as objects of shipment. Animal medical rights must not be affected by conflicts of interest, and legal drug sales and delivery to veterinary hospitals must not be prohibited. Veterinarians should pay attention to the profession of animals, and veterinarians have the legal right to use human medicine to treat animals. Animal medicine is a veterinary profession, and animal medical planning and medication should be led by veterinarians. We oppose the release of animal medicine dispensing rights to pharmacists who have no expertise in animal pathology.
title_en: Veterinarians can legally use human medicine to treat animals, and the medical treatment of animals should be controlled by veterinary professionals

title_zh: 針對單眼失明者，應放寬身心障礙手冊發放資格以及檢討鑑定標準。
proposal_zh:
提議內容或建議事項  
我國目前針對單眼失明的障礙者，於法規的限制有諸多不合理之處。 
其中最大的困境在於，單眼失明而另一眼視覺正常者無法申請身心障礙手冊 
衛福部目前針對單眼視覺障礙者的判斷標準如下： 
輕度1.兩眼視力優眼在0.1至0.2者 
2.兩眼視野各為20度以內者。 
3.優眼自動視野計中心二十四度程式檢查，平均缺損大於25DB（不含）者。 
4.單眼全盲（無光覺）而另眼視力在0.2（含）至0.4（不含）者。，或兩眼視野各為20度以內者。　 
社會局表示，申請身心障礙手冊是以醫師的診斷為依據， 
以功能較優的器官做為鑑定標準，比較符合社會福利資源公平分配原則， 
若當事人的器官或肢體受損之後，還能用的部位功能都還算可以， 
卻將其視為身心障礙者，反而是一種「歧視」。 
  
而內政部針對相關爭議曾給出以下回復： 
「將單眼失明，另一眼矯正視力在0．2（含）至0．4（不含）者放寬納入身心障礙範圍，至是否繼續放寬，考量我國現行輕度視障之等級，已較其他先進國家寬鬆，且單眼全盲，另一眼正常，其有效視率功能為80％，基於有限福利資源的運用及公平原則，仍決議不予納入。」故依據現行身心障礙等級規定，單眼0.04以下，另一眼如在0.4以上者，非屬於身心障礙之範圍，本部僅能依據法令規定辦理。」 
失去單眼視力，視覺之有效率功能如何維持在80%，這種結論違背正常經驗法則。 
  
  
況且單眼失明所造成之生活上之障礙絕非輕度可以形容 
單眼者視覺上對於方位認知感、距離感、立體感、產生偏差； 
視野範圍雖然也許合乎標準，但仍較兩眼者狹礙，常有視覺死角產生。 
走路常會撞到、跌倒；不便駕駛車輛；取物、落點差距與手無法穩合；心理上失去自信，因而與社會疏離； 
常因僱主無意願聘僱，失去工作與維持基本生活的機會。 
諸如此類均無法以儀器來鑑定，但總造成單眼者日常生活上許多的不便與困擾。 
  
  
建議辦法: 
(一).應依法增補並放寬視力障礙項下之不足: 
應承認單眼失明就是視力障礙。發與身心障礙手冊其輕、中、重度則依優眼視力來做分別 
(二).應尊重醫師所做之醫療判斷，如醫師認可單眼失明之狀況是明確之身理障礙，確有使生活產生支障之狀況，則政府機關應尊重專業發與身心障礙手冊。 
單眼失明就是視力障礙，社會制度應正視這樣的事實，不再對單眼視障者給予制度性歧視，並且有義務給予其理所當然之協助。
benefits_zh:
1.促使有關單位正視制度性的歧視，將社會正義落實於單眼失明者。 
2.達成憲法上所保障人人平等之概念，給予單眼視掌聲實質上的平等。 
3.使單眼失明者於生活各處具有被公平對待的機會，尤其在就業與就學方面，不要讓他們在制度上與生活上的身分產生矛盾，進而失去立足於社會的機會。
proposal_en: Suggested Contents or Suggested Matters There are many unreasonable restrictions in laws and regulations for people with monocular blindness in our country. The biggest dilemma is that people who are blind in one eye and have normal vision in the other eye cannot apply for a Handbook of Physical and Mental Disabilities. The Ministry of Health and Welfare currently has the following criteria for judging people with monocular visual impairment: Mild 1. Those whose vision in both eyes is 0.1 to 0.2 in the superior eye. 2. Those whose vision in both eyes is within 20 degrees. 3. Those who have an average defect greater than 25DB (not included) in the 24-degree program inspection of the center of the automatic perimetry of the superior eye. 4. Total blindness in one eye (no light perception) and visual acuity in the other eye ranging from 0.2 (inclusive) to 0.4 (exclusive). , or the field of view of both eyes is within 20 degrees each. The Social Affairs Bureau stated that the application for the Handbook of Physical and Mental Disabilities is based on the doctor's diagnosis, and the organs with better functions are used as the identification standard, which is more in line with the principle of fair distribution of social welfare resources. If the organs or limbs of the parties are damaged, the functions of the parts that can still be used are not bad, but it is a kind of "discrimination" to treat them as people with disabilities. The Ministry of the Interior has given the following reply in response to related disputes: "Those who are blind in one eye and have a corrected visual acuity of 0.2 (inclusive) to 0.4 (exclusive) in the other eye are relaxed from being included in the scope of physical and mental disabilities. As for whether to continue to relax, considering the current level of mild visual impairment in China, it is already looser than other advanced countries. With one eye completely blind and the other eye normal, the effective vision rate is 80%. Based on the use of limited welfare resources and the principle of fairness, it is still decided not to be included." , if the other eye is above 0.4, it does not belong to the scope of physical and mental disabilities, and this department can only handle it in accordance with the provisions of laws and regulations. "With the loss of monocular vision, how to maintain the effective function of vision at 80% is contrary to the normal rule of thumb. Moreover, the obstacles in life caused by blindness in one eye are by no means mild and indescribable. People with one eye have deviations in their vision of orientation, distance, and three-dimensionality. Although the field of vision may meet the standard, it is still narrower than that of people with two eyes. There are often blind spots in vision. I often bump into and fall when I walk; it is inconvenient to drive a vehicle; I can’t hold objects stably due to gaps in picking up and landing; I lose confidence psychologically and thus alienate from society; Such things cannot be identified by instruments, but they always cause a lot of inconvenience and troubles in the daily life of monocular people. Suggested methods: (1). The deficiencies under the category of visual impairment should be supplemented and relaxed according to law: it should be recognized that blindness in one eye is visual impairment. The light, moderate, and severe cases of hair and disability are classified according to the visual acuity of the good eye. (2) The medical judgment made by the doctor should be respected. If the doctor recognizes that blindness in one eye is a clear physical disability, and there is a situation that causes life support, the government agency should respect the professional hair and the handbook of physical and mental disabilities. Monocular blindness is visual impairment. The social system should face up to this fact, stop systematically discriminating against monocular visually impaired people, and have the obligation to give them natural assistance.
title_en: For those who are blind in one eye, the eligibility for issuance of handbooks of disabilities and the review of identification standards should be relaxed.

title_zh: 「搶救抱卵母蟹、保護漁業資源，要求農委會修改現行管制辦法，全年禁止捕撈抱卵母蟹」
proposal_zh:
2021年十二月中旬，我在澎湖馬公漁市看到一整籃幾乎是抱卵母蟹，全身被綑綁，仰躺等著買家（如附圖）。這些母蟹，可以剷下無數的子蟹，卻如此被提早獵殺曝屍市場。臺灣近海螃蟹已明顯枯竭，我們竟還容許少數漁民用如此粗殘方式濫捕，真是令人又急又怒。 
  
臺灣還有多少市場每天上演這樣的掠殺？澎湖縣農漁局表示無法可管，中央政府難道也無法可管？我查了相關法律。關於抱卵母蟹的管制，中央主管機關是農委會。 
 農委會有一個辦法叫＜沿近海漁船捕撈蟳蟹類漁獲管制措施＞，其中第二條寫著：「每年8月16日至11月15日，禁止漁船捕撈將受精卵抱於體外腹側之母蟹（俗稱開花母蟹）」。這樣的規定，顯然過於保守，無法保護這三個月之外的大量懷孕母蟹。 
 我找到了農委會漁業署主管科科長，請教他如何修改這個管制措施，讓目前只管制八月中到十一月中不得捕捉抱卵母蟹的規定，延為一整年都不得捕捉。 
該科長表示，目前預計2022年一月漁業署將會召集漁會組織、公民團體、漁業專家三方一起的諮詢會議，若有共識，即進行修改，並在公告新規定兩個月後正式實施。 
 也就是說，若能順利完成，最快明年四月起，抱卵母蟹就永遠不能抓了。
benefits_zh:
獵殺母蟹，是所有文明國家所禁止。它不但是虐殺孕母的暴行，也是毀滅生態的愚蹟。保護母蟹，讓海蟹生生不息，既有利於生態，也有利於絕大多數漁民永續生活。臺灣近年濫捕嚴重，沿海處處魚蟹枯竭，我們需要趕快保護剩下的少數母蟹。她們是海洋未來生態的希望。 
 目前看來，諮詢會議肯定是會開的，但放懷孕母蟹一條生路的請求能不能過關，就得看有多大的社會期待與壓力。所以，漁業署召開諮詢會之前，我想，我們需要凝聚公民的反霸凌懷孕母蟹的聲音，讓規定的修改一次通過。
proposal_en: In mid-December 2021, I saw a whole basket of almost ovipositing female crabs at the Magong fish market in Penghu, tied up all over the body, lying on their backs and waiting for buyers (as shown in the attached photo). These female crabs can shovel countless daughter crabs, but they are hunted and killed early to expose the corpse market. The crabs in the coastal waters of Taiwan have obviously been depleted, and we still allow a small number of fishermen to catch them in such a brutal way, which is really anxious and angry. How many other markets in Taiwan have such looting every day? The Bureau of Agriculture and Fisheries of Penghu County said it was out of control. Could it be that the central government is also out of control? I checked the relevant laws. Regarding the control of ovipositor crabs, the central competent authority is the Council of Agriculture. The Council of Agriculture has a measure called "Catch Control Measures for Catching Crabs by Offshore Fishing Vessels", and the second article reads: "From August 16 to November 15 every year, fishing boats are prohibited from catching female crabs that hold fertilized eggs on the ventral side of the body (commonly known as flowering female crabs)." Such regulations are obviously too conservative and cannot protect a large number of pregnant female crabs beyond these three months. I approached the Chief of the Fisheries Department of the Council of Agriculture and asked him how to modify this control measure, so that the current regulation that only prohibits the capture of oviposit crabs from mid-August to mid-November will be extended for a whole year. The section chief said that it is currently expected that in January 2022, the Fisheries Administration will convene a consultation meeting among fishery associations, civic groups, and fishery experts. If there is a consensus, amendments will be made and the new regulations will be officially implemented two months after the announcement. That is to say, if it can be successfully completed, oocyte-bearing crabs will never be caught as soon as April next year.
title_en: "Rescue oviposit crabs, protect fishery resources, ask the Council of Agriculture to amend the current control measures, and prohibit the fishing of oviposit crabs throughout the year"

BERTLabels: Media Regulation and False Information Online
title_zh: 為消弭社會疑慮，政府於推動攸關「人民性傾向、性別認同等政策，須主動公開「專家學者報告」及辦理公聽會。
proposal_zh: 1. 政府近年來諸多政策引發社會爭議及人民不滿，其中以篡改民間文化婚姻意涵及以「多元性別」概念來替代男女性別分類基礎為主要，另罔顧科學事實限制同志及後同志族群選擇結合宗教或文化的醫療自由，引爆台灣族群對立情況嚴峻，為消弭社會疑慮及降低人民對政府的不信任感，提請政府(含行政院、衛福部及教育部等單位)於推動攸關「人民個人特徵(性傾向、性別認同或性別特質等)」之法令(包括：禁止迥轉治療的政策或法案)、措施、施政計畫、行政指導等業務，須依〈政府資訊公開法〉第6條主動公開「委託研究之專家學者報告」之全部內容及受委託學者專家過去5年接受政府及非政府委託(或補助)研究計劃之總金額及廠商名單，並於「專家學者報告」公布後須辦理地方及中央層級公聽會，並於人民請求時，須依照行政程序法辦理聽證會，由人民推舉之學者專家與政府所委託之學者專家進行科學鑑定，除可召公信外更可以讓人民清楚理解政府所規劃之公共政策方向乃係基於真實科學結論及符合社會大眾的公共利益。2. 就行政院欲修訂「性別平等教育法」乙案，敦請行政院教育部依照〈政府資訊公開法〉第六條，立即公布《青少年性教育及情感教育（The Education of Affection and Sexuality）倡議案實務訪查計畫成果報告書》並召開公聽會聆聽人民、家長及學生之意見。3. 就行政院衛生福利部欲透過行政命令方式明文「禁止性傾向扭轉治療」乙事，亦請衛福部依照〈政府資訊公開法〉第六條，立即公布由台灣精神科醫學會及台灣兒童青少年科醫學會之專家學者報告，並召開公聽會聆聽人民、後同志(Post-LGBTs)、家長、宗教團體(民俗收驚是否會被歸類為「密醫」行為？)、海內外學者專家等之意見。
benefits_zh: 1. 本案為實踐與保障：人民知的權利、思想自由、同志及後同志族群對於醫療選擇自由權利，並督促資訊透明及擴大對話來消弭人民疑慮。2. 按我國憲法第十一條規定：「人民有言論、講學、著作及出版之自由」，並「國家對於言論自由應給予最大限度之維護與保障，乃基於言論自由有實現自我、溝通意見、追求真理、滿足人民知的權利，形成公意，促進各種合理的政治及社會活動之功能，乃維持民主多元社會正常發展不可或缺之機制」乃司法院釋字第509號之精神。 「保障人民知的權利，增進人民對公共事務之瞭解、信賴及監督，並促進民主參與」更為〈政府資訊公開法〉第一條明文；故對於攸關公共利益之資訊，政府須依〈政府資訊公開法〉第六條，主動公開。3. 按「非常時期，國家固得為因應非常事態之需要，而對人民權利作較嚴格之限制，惟限制內容仍不得侵犯最低限度之人權保障。思想自由保障人民內在精神活動，是人類文明之根源與言論自由之基礎，亦為憲法所欲保障最基本之人性尊嚴，對自由民主憲政秩序之存續，具特殊重要意義，不容國家機關以包括緊急事態之因應在內之任何理由侵犯之，亦不容國家機關以任何方式予以侵害。縱國家處於非常時期，出於法律規定…皆所不許，是為不容侵犯之最低限度人權保障」乃司法院釋字第567號之基礎。政府以行政命令方式「禁止性傾向扭轉治療」，明顯屬於使用國家機器限制人民選擇醫療之自由。政府打壓人民基於宗教文化「人性可勝天」的信念，並且限制人民透過現代醫學與文化及宗教結合的方式來「扭轉」面對同性性吸引與其內心壓力。(指醫學上的藥物治療配合符合其文化與宗教之諮商、輔導及陪伴)。此舉等同於限制人民只能夠看西醫但卻禁止中西醫並行一樣。無論性傾向或是一般疾病，陪伴和鼓勵於治療中都是不可欠缺的，而政府的行政命令只是讓同志身邊的親屬/家人/志工更艱困的去陪伴同志度過生命中的挑戰。 4. 政府於推行「性別多元化」政策時，諸多名詞引發社會爭議。按聯合國婦女賦權(UN Women)及衛生組織(WHO)、清楚將「性別(SEX)」定義為「男女之生理性別」。而「Gender Equality(性別差異平等)更是清楚指向消弭男女間基於社會文化、歷史等因素而產生的差異且「貶低」女性之對待。另聯合國「性別主流化(Gender Mainstreaming)」行動綱領也明確使用男女作為分類基礎。政府未使用國際清楚定義之名詞，導致人民對政府不信任，更讓人民質疑是否在推動「消滅男女性別分類」之政策？5. 為消弭人民對政府的疑慮，政府須依法公開所有相關資訊並舉辦多場公聽會，以昭公信。
proposal_en: 1. In recent years, many policies of the government have caused social controversy and dissatisfaction among the people. Among them, tampering with the meaning of marriage in folk culture and replacing the gender classification of men and women with the concept of "multiple genders" are the main ones. In addition, ignoring scientific facts, restricting the medical freedom of gays and post-gays who choose to combine religion or culture has ignited the severe confrontation among ethnic groups in Taiwan. etc.)” (including: policies or bills prohibiting reversal of treatment), measures, policy plans, administrative guidance, etc., must actively disclose the entire content of the “reports of experts and scholars entrusted with research” in accordance with Article 6 of the “Law on Disclosure of Government Information” and the total amount of research projects entrusted by scholars and experts to accept government and non-government (or subsidy) research projects in the past 5 years and the list of manufacturers. Scholars and experts entrusted by the government to carry out scientific appraisal, not only can arouse public trust, but also can let the people clearly understand that the public policy direction planned by the government is based on real scientific conclusions and conforms to the public interest of the general public. 2. With regard to the Executive Yuan’s plan to amend the “Gender Equality Education Act” B, we urge the Ministry of Education of the Executive Yuan to follow Article 6 of the “Government Information Disclosure Act” to immediately publish the “Report on the Results of the Practical Investigation Plan for the Education of Affection and Sexuality Initiative” and hold a public hearing to listen to the opinions of the people, parents, and students. 3. Regarding the matter that the Ministry of Health and Welfare of the Executive Yuan intends to expressly "prohibit sexual orientation conversion therapy" through an administrative order, the Ministry of Health and Welfare is also requested to follow Article 6 of the "Government Information Disclosure Law" to immediately publish the reports of experts and scholars from the Taiwan Psychiatric Association and the Taiwan Pediatric and Adolescent Medical Association, and hold public hearings to listen to the opinions of the people, post-LGBTs, parents, religious groups (would it be classified as "secret medicine" behavior?), scholars and experts at home and abroad, etc.
title_en: In order to dispel social doubts, the government must take the initiative to publish the "reports of experts and scholars" and conduct public hearings when promoting policies related to "people's sexual orientation and gender identity."

title_zh: 廢除稅務人員稅務獎勵金
proposal_zh: 廢除稅務人員稅務獎勵金■ 提議內容或建議事項1、 查稅獎金自2004年立法院修法廢除後，財稅機關卻利用內部「財政部核發稅務獎勵金作業要點」借屍還魂，巧立名目(團體部分共16項、個人部分25項)，至今仍編列預算自肥濫發。2016年五個國稅局總共編列1.03億元稅務獎金預算。經統計，簡任十到十三職等的高官，平均更可分得9.8萬元，職等越高領越多。2017年5月立委陳瑩爆料，國稅局現行編列上億元的稅務獎金，沒有法源，甚至不用查稅，連辦理路跑、桌球錦標賽、修電腦、辦公室修繕等與查稅無關的作為都可以領獎，甚至領獎人數比國稅局編制員額還多。2、 在經濟低迷、薪資倒退17年，財政部竟然自2014年至2017年9月共超徵稅收超過5,500億元。超徵稅收，卻不告知國人用途、也沒有返還民眾，還拿來做為政績，相對新加坡、香港將超徵稅收退還民眾，足見國稅局將超徵款納入國庫，顯不合理。3、 獎勵金作業要點中列明核定補徵或追繳鉅額稅款並徵起，即可核發個人稅務獎勵金。此無異鼓勵稅務人員不管有無理由、有無證據，能課就課能追就追。查稅課稅本是其工作職責，然在獎金的誘惑下，難保稅務人員不會為了獎金而濫開稅單，而即使發出錯誤稅單，也不會受到懲處，行政救濟又完全失靈無效(行政法院人民勝訴率不到6%)，間接或直接造成台灣稅務冤案的問題泛濫！4、 稅制不公是臺灣人才流失主要原因，嚇跑外資和人才。依《聯合國2015年世界投資報告》，台灣吸引外資在全球211個國家或地區中，排名倒數第五。台灣的FDI（外商直接投資）是越南的1/3、菲律賓的1/2，只勉強贏過北韓和巴基斯坦。資金不來，人才只得出走。外商統計台灣人才已流失240萬人，幾乎佔總人口數10%。牛津經濟研究院估計到2021年時，台灣專業人才將占外移人口的61.1%！5、 查稅本來就是稅務人員職責，豈能因課稅績效好，額外分到獎勵金，為免濫課稅圖謀獎金之歪風，主張廢除所有稅務人員的稅務獎勵金。
benefits_zh: ■ 利益與影響：1、 稅務獎勵金是變相鼓勵稅務人員濫發稅單的恐怖原因，在稅捐機關不受到監督、行政救濟制度失靈的情況下，協商稅額的歪風盛行，企業或個人被濫開稅單，公司因此倒閉、企業出走、外資退場、受災戶遭限制出境時有所聞。刪除獎金制度才能杜絕稅務員假公權力圖謀獎金的弊端，保障人民基本的生存權、工作權及財產權。。2、 徹底廢除稅務獎勵金制度及內規，才能避免濫課稅圖謀獎金，減少目前經濟低迷情況下，竟年年超徵的不合理情況。3、 對民眾而言，可以有效預防因為獎金所引起的烏龍稅單。對稅務人員而言，可避免背負大眾質疑，是否因績效獎金因素而濫開稅單，建立受大眾信賴的體制。
proposal_en: Abolition of Tax Incentives for Tax Officials ■ Suggested Contents or Suggested Items 1. Since the Legislative Yuan amended and abolished tax bonuses in 2004, the fiscal and taxation authorities have used the internal "Ministry of Finance's Approval and Issuance of Tax Incentives Operation Key Points" to reincarnate the body and set up clever names (a total of 16 items for groups and 25 items for individuals). In 2016, the five national tax bureaus prepared a total of 103 million yuan in tax bonus budgets. According to statistics, senior officials with ranks ten to thirteen can earn an average of 98,000 yuan, and the higher the rank, the more they get. In May 2017, legislator Chen Ying broke the news that the National Taxation Bureau currently compiles hundreds of millions of dollars in tax bonuses. There is no legal source, and even tax inspections are not required. Even road runs, billiard tournaments, computer repairs, office repairs, etc. that have nothing to do with tax inspections can receive prizes. There are even more people receiving awards than the National Taxation Bureau has staff. 2. In the 17 years of economic downturn and salary regression, the Ministry of Finance has exceeded tax collection by more than 550 billion yuan from 2014 to September 2017. The over-levied tax was not informed to the people of the country, nor was it returned to the people. It was used as a political achievement. Compared with Singapore and Hong Kong, the over-levied tax was refunded to the people. 3. In the key points of the bonus operation, it is stated that the tax incentives for individuals can be approved and issued after a huge amount of tax has been collected or recovered and collected. This is tantamount to encouraging tax officials to follow suit as soon as they can, regardless of whether there is a reason or evidence. Tax inspection and taxation are their job duties, but under the temptation of bonuses, it is difficult to guarantee that tax officials will not issue tax bills indiscriminately for bonuses, and even if they issue wrong tax bills, they will not be punished, and administrative remedies are completely ineffective (the administrative court’s people’s winning rate is less than 6%). 4. The unfair tax system is the main reason for brain drain in Taiwan, scaring away foreign capital and talents. According to the United Nations 2015 World Investment Report, Taiwan ranks fifth from the bottom among 211 countries or regions in the world in attracting foreign investment. Taiwan's FDI (foreign direct investment) is 1/3 of that of Vietnam and 1/2 of that of the Philippines, and it only barely beats North Korea and Pakistan. If the funds do not come, the talents have to leave. According to foreign statistics, Taiwan has lost 2.4 million talents, accounting for almost 10% of the total population. Oxford Economics estimates that by 2021, Taiwanese professionals will account for 61.1% of the immigrant population! 5. Tax inspection is originally the responsibility of tax officials. How can they be given extra bonuses because of their good tax performance?
title_en: Repeal the Taxman Tax Incentive

title_zh: 高中及國中小上課時間改為9點到15點
proposal_zh: 台灣為世界上上課時間最長的國家 一共為10小時 而學生卻因為上課時間過長，家長安排補習時間過長，造成學生一天只能睡5-7小時，導致學生去學校時無法專心學習，且未達到一天睡9-10小時之標準，影響小孩發育，希望能夠藉由縮短上課時數減輕學生的負擔
benefits_zh: 優點：學生學習力提升，學生負擔減輕
proposal_en: Taiwan is the country with the longest class time in the world, with a total of 10 hours. However, students can only sleep for 5-7 hours a day because of the long class time and the tutoring time arranged by their parents. As a result, students cannot concentrate on studying when they go to school, and they do not meet the standard of 9-10 hours of sleep a day, which affects the development of children. It is hoped that the burden on students can be reduced by shortening the number of class hours
title_en: The class time of high school and junior high school is changed from 9:00 to 15:00

title_zh: 反對新北市瑞芳區深澳電廠擴建
proposal_zh: 反對新北市瑞芳區深澳電廠擴建
benefits_zh: 台電和環評委員不能因發電而忽略北北基市民健康，這次深澳電等於是一個全新的燃煤電廠，不但引起許多環保團體、環保人士關注，也引發北北基市民對於健康及空汙的疑慮。基於對北北基市民未來健康，以及考慮未來推動綠能和乾淨能源等世界趨勢，籲請政府及台電勿一意孤行，枉置北北基市民健康於不顧。
