title_zh: 建請主管機關重視FACEBOOK(臉書)購物詐騙一案，研議如何防制與作為，望請各界連署支持
proposal_zh:
近期在FACEBOOK(臉書)出現大量一頁式購物廣告與粉絲專頁，經查皆是疑似購物詐騙，以限時低價促銷與到貨付款，假冒台灣各大公司或即將在台開設商場等名義等話術利誘消費者購買，但消費者收貨付款之後卻發現商品與廣告不符，品質低劣，前去購物粉絲專頁要求退貨時卻遭到封鎖，求助無門，消費者必須自行想辦法找報關行申請退款退貨，時而遭受報關行以需扣除國際運費為由收取若干金錢得以退款，若消費者拒絕扣款則揚言消費者需自行找尋賣家去申請退款，因此消費者只能自行成立自救會收集資料向報關行或尋求消保團體申請退貨退款。 
 在宅配規章內有說明，寄件者必須完全填寫清楚各資料才准配送，但這類購物詐騙的配送單往往只填寫了報關行名稱，甚至完全沒有填寫寄件者為何人，明顯為了讓消費者無從與寄件者聯繫而包庇。 
 一頁式購物廣告標榜可到貨先拆封驗貨後付款，但實際上因為宅配業者與報關行在配送單上標註不得拆封驗貨，導致消費者在還沒看到商品實品狀況時就得先付款才能拆封，這嚴重影響到消費者的權益。 
 FACEBOOK(臉書)線上購物是該網站允許行為，但該網站卻沒做到督導之責，放任各種詐騙行為，雖然該網站為境外公司，在台灣沒有設立分公司，但仍然請主管機關向該網站要求重視這類詐騙行為，以維護國人網路購物的各項權益。
benefits_zh:
應強制要求宅配業者對於各類契約公司寄件包裹，配送單強制要求寫明寄件資訊聯繫方式等，以便消費者聯繫寄件公司，若寄件人填寫不清，宅配業者得拒絕配送。 
 應強制要求宅配業者對於貨到付款之物品，在消費者付款前無條件拆封檢查商品確認無誤後才付費，以避免不肖廠商寄出劣質品或與廣告不符之商品，讓消費者受騙上當，若消費者要求宅配業者提供寄件者聯絡資訊，宅配業者不得拒絕並盡力協助消費者。 
 應要求FACEBOOK(臉書)對於商品類廣告應盡督導審核之責，以避免詐騙網頁亂象發生。 
 這些商品沒有繳納各項營業稅，應該要求報關行或進口商開立發票，增加國家稅收
proposal_en: Recently, a large number of one-page shopping advertisements and fan pages have appeared on FACEBOOK (Facebook). After investigation, they are all suspected shopping scams. They use time-limited low-price promotions and payment on delivery, pretend to be major Taiwanese companies or open shopping malls in Taiwan, etc. to lure consumers to buy. A certain amount of money can be refunded on the grounds that the international shipping fee needs to be deducted. If the consumer refuses to deduct the payment, the consumer will be threatened to find the seller to apply for a refund. It is stated in the home delivery regulations that the sender must completely fill in all the information before delivery is allowed. However, the delivery slips of this type of shopping fraud often only fill in the name of the customs broker, and even do not fill in the name of the sender at all. It is obviously a cover-up in order to prevent consumers from contacting the sender. The one-page shopping advertisement advertises that the goods can be unpacked and inspected before payment, but in fact, because home delivery companies and customs brokers mark the delivery slips as not to be unpacked and inspected, consumers have to pay before they can open the package before seeing the actual condition of the product, which seriously affects the rights and interests of consumers. FACEBOOK (Facebook) online shopping is allowed by the website, but the website has not fulfilled its supervisory responsibility and allowed various fraudulent activities. Although the website is an overseas company and has no branch office in Taiwan, the competent authority is still requested to request the website to pay attention to such fraudulent activities in order to protect the rights and interests of Chinese people's online shopping.
title_en: It is recommended that the competent authorities pay attention to the case of FACEBOOK (Facebook) shopping fraud, and discuss how to prevent it and take action. We hope that all walks of life can sign and support

title_zh: 廢除車安中心  成立國家級公正鑑定單位 並加速TNCAP車輛撞擊測試
proposal_zh:
近年新車災情不斷，從福斯DSG變速箱、福特PS變速箱、VOLVO MPS6變速箱、 
馬自達CX5引擎噴水、TOYOTA RAV4 車頂漏水，均現重大瑕疵爭議。 
 消費者求助無門，缺乏與時俱進的法規護體，小蝦米難抗大鯨魚， 
不僅向車商爭取權益頻頻受挫，更連帶衍生相關車安問題，均讓國內催生「檸檬車法」意識抬頭。 
  
因買進口車瑕疵沒保障！買國產車行車不安全！ 
  
  
1.請交通部廢除車安中心 請行政院整合國家資源加速成立成立國家廠級單位之公正鑑定單位 
自馬自達近千人集體消費爭訟案起，法院發函詢問車安中心是否有能量進行鑑定? 
 車安中心均函覆無鑑定能量！  
2019年黃國昌委員辦得檸檬車公聽會車安中心公開表示沒有鑑定能量  
無鑑定能量的車安中心如何能負責國人的車輛安全審驗及車安全檢驗 查察與鑑定等業務?  
以及車輛安全性調查召回改正監督管理及相關資訊系統維護與運作?  
這樣國人如何會放心把行車安全的生命財產交給無能的車安中心？  
這些年來車安中心既不積極，也不願意進步提高鑑定能量  
只會照抄車廠報告當平安符回復車主與消費者  
車安中心經費募款方面亦有利益迴避之爭議  
車輛工業公會、北市汽車代理商公會....等募款上百萬  
該中心早已恐已失公正中立客觀之立場。  
惟每年政府還要編列預算給車安中心，  
實是有浪費人民辛苦的納稅錢，養肥貓冗員之虞！  
  
  
2.加速TNCAP車輛撞擊測試  
立委林俊憲委員點出了車主自救會社團與交通部、 
經濟部溝通後的共同心聲， 這一點在高嘉瑜委員的記者會上也大聲疾呼， 
 就是官僚與推託文化喪送了臺灣車主消費者的權益.........  
車廠虛以尾蛇地忠誠滿意服務 又有抽稅分羹的經濟部當靠山  
交通部不敢判定瑕疵不敢召回  消保處推託假冒偽善地搓湯圓  
結果消費者繳稅付保護費當凱子與盤子 
  
  
T-NCAP計畫就是給消費者選擇國產車最好的保障。  
請行政院整合國家資源，成立國家廠級單位推動T-NCAP， 
 以實質提升汽車產業產品品質與競爭力。
benefits_zh:
1.廢除車安中心 請行政院整合國家資源加速成立成立國家廠級單位 
保障全國人民的約路之安全及車輛財產保障 
  
2.成立國家廠級單位推動T-NCAP， 
以實質提升汽車產業產品品質與競爭力有公正鑑定能量標準 才能推動電動車產業發展 
鑑定能量才有高品質製造生產量讓汽車產業成為下一個護國神山 造福子孫以下引自林俊憲委員質詢內容  
https://www.facebook.com/207587482608523/videos/392404175103411/ 
T-NCAP卻是無聲無息，並且預算到現在僅執行了20%，進度嚴重落後。 
 之所以耽擱那麼久，車安中心、車測中心等部內單位之間的溝通出現非常大的問題，  
我也要求部長應主動出面整合這些單位，否則只會永遠拖延下去。 
  
黃國昌委員公聽會內容 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RArHSNiZxLg 
  
馬自達 VOLVO 福特自救會上凱道推動檸檬車法 https://tw.appledaily.com/life/20191130/E7QYCHZRXQANAFKLK55CHUMPRM/ 
  
車主控TOYOTA RAV4漏水 和泰：未構成召回條件 https://www.cna.com.tw/news/ahel/202101080125.aspx?fbclid=IwAR1a6vmoxaQkP5mF2vIf8NQueL-KUmTZojfoUCUpOryWS62vDjMzB0I06sI 
  
新TOYOTA RAV4半年斷電5次台中鐵粉心碎 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?fbclid=IwAR0Q1U7fRiSrPl4UZNnF62A4JaTcmLBAA5vNv8kkh8JcQ1InoqS1xG7I0DE&v=74XCeJf1a9A&feature=youtu.be 
  
【車主氣瘋】衰買「檸檬車」僅擔保180天　經濟部喬半天仍護車商還祭緩衝 
https://www.upmedia.mg/news_info.php?SerialNo=104308&fbclid=IwAR0eL-YUyjgPdZDYuEMhDkMaZJ2kteRnXoHnQDKytwu22T8OLR1RKVyzAwc
proposal_en: In recent years, new car disasters have continued, from Volkswagen DSG gearboxes, Ford PS gearboxes, VOLVO MPS6 gearboxes, Mazda CX5 engine water spray, TOYOTA RAV4 roof leaks, all have major flaws and disputes. Consumers have nowhere to turn for help, lack of laws and regulations that keep pace with the times, and small shrimps are hard to fight against big whales. Not only are they frequently frustrated in fighting for rights and interests with car dealers, but they also cause related car safety issues, which have led to the rise of awareness of the "lemon car law" in China. There is no guarantee for buying imported cars with defects! It is not safe to buy a domestic car! 1. Please ask the Ministry of Communications to abolish the car safety center, and ask the Executive Yuan to integrate national resources to speed up the establishment of a national factory-level impartial appraisal unit. Since Mazda’s collective consumption dispute involving nearly a thousand people, the court has sent a letter asking whether the car safety center has the energy to conduct appraisal? In 2019, committee member Huang Guochang held a lemon car public hearing. The car safety center publicly stated that there is no appraisal energy. How can a car safety center without appraisal energy be responsible for the vehicle safety inspection and car safety inspection inspection and appraisal of Chinese people? Over the years, the car safety center has been neither active nor willing to improve its identification capabilities. It will only copy the report of the car factory as a safe talisman to reply to car owners and consumers. The car safety center also has disputes over fundraising. However, the government has to prepare a budget for the Che An Center every year, which is really a waste of the people's hard-earned tax money, and there is a danger of raising fat cats and redundant staff! 2. Speeding up the TNCAP vehicle crash test. Legislator Lin Junxian pointed out the common aspirations of the car owners' self-rescue association and the Ministry of Communications and the Ministry of Economic Affairs. This point was also clarified at the press conference of member Gao Jiayu. It is bureaucracy and dodging culture that have ruined the rights and interests of Taiwanese car owners and consumers... Automakers are loyal and satisfied with their services. As a result, consumers pay taxes and protection fees as a winner and a dish. The T-NCAP plan is the best guarantee for consumers to choose domestic cars. The Executive Yuan is requested to integrate national resources and establish a national factory-level unit to promote T-NCAP, so as to substantially improve the product quality and competitiveness of the automobile industry.
title_en: Abolish the vehicle safety center, set up a national impartial appraisal unit and accelerate the TNCAP vehicle crash test

title_zh: 請優化育兒津貼的排富條款
proposal_zh: 今年新生兒生育率創下新低，政府基於少子化危機推出的育兒津貼政策不應排除特定群體。考量到排富條款是上任政府多年前設計的方案，已不合時宜，因此建議執政團隊進行討論改進。
benefits_zh:
首先，從政府預算來看，根據107年綜所稅統計資料僅有約7%的國民是20%以上的群體不能領取津貼。而到明年8月對於93%國民的津貼調整幅度為100%。前者的預算影響明顯低於後者，以預算有限為理由排除特定人群並不合理。 
  
第二，所有受薪階層都是透過自己的時間和精力來獲得收入，並且誠實納稅。不同群體在繳交各項稅金，健保費，國民年金時已經差別課稅，若是在接受福利政策時受到差別待遇，並不符合政府所說的社會公平正義原則。 
  
最後，收入20%的群體僅是社會的中層，即使全心力投入工作，在台北也難以安心成家。這群體也是教育水平相對較高，離開職場的機會成本較高，並且生育率相對較低的群體。若福利政策排除中間群體，無異於是降低該群體生育意願，或是降低該階層往上流動性的可能性，將會導致中階勞動力的減少或外流，並加深本土勞動力M型化。
proposal_en: The birth rate of newborns hit a new low this year, and the government's childcare subsidy policy based on the crisis of declining birth rate should not exclude specific groups. Considering that the wealth exclusion clause is a plan designed by the previous government many years ago, it is out of date, so it is suggested that the ruling team discuss and improve it.
title_en: Please optimize the terms of wealth exclusion for childcare allowances

title_zh: 開放紅黃牌重機可停於一般機車格
proposal_zh: 之前台北市政府有開放部分路段增設大型重機停車格，但是隨著政策開放，越來越多人已經擁有大型重機駕照，也越來越多人駕駛大型重機，依照目前的停車位規劃根本是供不應求，若是讓大型重機停於汽車格是浪費公共空間的作法，希望可以更有效率的使用公共停車空間，再說目前大型重機所需要停車空間與一般機車並無太大差異，是可以共同使用，懇請修改機車停車格使用規範，將大型重機納入可停放之一，有效使用停車空間，而不會造成大型重機騎士困擾，謝謝。
benefits_zh: 可以活化利用機車停車空間，不必重新增設大型重機停車空間，也不會排擠到目前已經存在之汽車停車格，也可節省增設大型重機停車格經費，把經費用在對的地方，亦可讓大型重機騎士可以有空間停車。
proposal_en: Previously, the Taipei City Government opened some roads to add large-scale heavy-duty motorcycle parking spaces. However, with the opening of the policy, more and more people already have a large-scale heavy-duty motorcycle driver’s license, and more and more people drive large-scale heavy-duty motorcycles. According to the current parking space planning, the supply is in short supply. If large-scale heavy-duty motorcycles are parked in the car grid, it is a waste of public space. I hope that the public parking space can be used more efficiently. Besides, the parking space required by large-scale heavy-duty motorcycles is not much different from that of ordinary motorcycles. They can be used together. One, effectively use the parking space without causing trouble to the riders of large heavy machines, thank you.
title_en: Red and yellow licensed heavy machines can be parked in general locomotive grids

title_zh: 教檢考後應公布試題
proposal_zh:
考試應秉持公平、公正、公開的原則。 
107年教檢考後應公布試題，若不公開試題， 如何確保考試的公平性與公正性？ 
讓全民共同檢閱試題，維持試題的品質，讓應考人有機會釋疑，也確保題目不會有所偏頗，才能維持考試的公平性和穩定性。
benefits_zh:
若107年以後的教檢考後都不公布試題，如何維持考試的公平與公正性？ 
又如何保證不會有黑箱作業發生？ 
其次，也對於考生的成績，以及之後的考生準備方向也會受到影響
proposal_en: Examinations should uphold the principles of fairness, impartiality and openness. In 2010, the test questions should be released after the teaching examination. If the test questions are not made public, how to ensure the fairness and impartiality of the test? Let the whole people review the test questions together, maintain the quality of the test questions, give candidates the opportunity to clarify their doubts, and ensure that the questions are not biased, in order to maintain the fairness and stability of the test.
title_en: The test questions should be released after the teaching examination

title_zh: 修正漁港法全面開放漁港港區釣魚並全面興建釣魚平台
proposal_zh:
一、        國內所有漁港全面開放民眾釣魚。 
二、        不論大小漁港需建設釣魚平台。 
三、        漁港須提供廁所和垃圾桶方便民眾使用。 
四、        漁港不得以任何名義向民眾收取費用。 
五、        漁港需設置救生器材，做為緊急救難之用。 
六、        風浪過大嚴禁民眾進入港區釣魚。 
七、        港區僅限使用釣竿釣魚，不得使用其他網具從事捕撈活動。 
八、        港區嚴禁鑽鑿打洞，違者以公共危險罪論處。 
九、        港區嚴禁丟棄垃圾、廢漁線，玻璃瓶等雜物，違者從重處分。 
十、        港區停泊的漁船，民眾未經同意不得登船。 
十一、     漁船停泊的纜繩，民眾不得觸碰。 
十二、     如在航道釣魚民眾需禮讓漁船通行，民眾不得以任何理由阻擋漁船出入。
benefits_zh:
一、台灣是海島國家，最大的資產就是海洋。 
二、港區也是相對安全的釣魚場所。 
三、日本的研究中顯示，釣魚是讓老人出門的主要動力，對於面臨老年化社會的台灣，釣魚活動是最值得推廣的休閒活動。 
四、漁港開放釣魚並改建釣魚平台，在同樣是海島國家的日本已經發展非常久的時間了。 
五、全面開放港區釣魚是投資成本最低效益最大的休閒建設。 
六、港區釣魚因為安全適合家庭出遊的休閒活動。 
七、推廣港區釣魚可帶動相關產業的發展。 
八、全面開放港區釣魚可以帶動港區周邊的經濟發展，包含魚市周邊景點…………。
proposal_en: 1. All domestic fishing ports are fully open to fishing for the public. 2. No matter the size of the fishing port, it is necessary to build a fishing platform. 3. Fishing ports must provide toilets and trash cans for the convenience of the public. 4. The fishing port shall not collect fees from the public in any name. 5. Fishing ports need to set up life-saving equipment for emergency rescue. 6. It is strictly forbidden for people to enter the port area for fishing when the wind and waves are too strong. 7. In the port area, only fishing rods can be used for fishing, and other nets are not allowed to engage in fishing activities. 8. Drilling and drilling holes are strictly prohibited in the port area. Violators will be punished as a crime of public danger. 9. It is strictly forbidden to discard garbage, waste fishing lines, glass bottles and other sundries in the port area. Violators will be punished severely. 10. People are not allowed to board fishing boats moored in the port area without consent. 11. People are not allowed to touch the cables moored by fishing boats. 12. People who are fishing in the waterway must give way to fishing boats, and people are not allowed to block fishing boats from entering or leaving for any reason.
title_en: Amend the Fishing Port Law to fully open the fishing port area to fishing and fully build fishing platforms

title_zh: 疫情當前應放寬通訊（遠距）心理諮商限制，研商合理核准作業要點
proposal_zh:
衛福部於108年11月29日衛部醫字第1081671409號函頒「心理師執行通訊心理諮商業務核准作業參考原則」在案，並於109年7月29日衛部醫字第1091664405號公告修正規定。上述「心理師執行通訊心理諮商業務核准作業參考原則」屬本案重要法規，以下稱「參考原則」；另「通訊心理諮商」以「遠距諮商」代稱之，以利大眾理解。 根據諮商心理師公會全國聯合會（以下簡稱諮商全聯會）統計，全國超過5萬名民眾（以下指稱均包含學生）因疫情升溫而被迫中斷心理諮商，其中包含自殺高危機學生、心理創傷與既有各式議題之民眾等，分佈在校園、社福機構、社區心理諮商所／治療所當中，尚不包括疫情間心理壓力大須尋求心理諮商者。然而，臺灣共有123間心理諮商所、81間心理治療所，但實際獲衛生局核准可執行遠距諮商的場所，兩者皆不到1成。 其中面臨的難題如下： 一、全國三萬名學生心理諮商被迫中斷全國學生心理諮商均因疫情停止面談，電話關懷與輔導無法取代心理諮商之效果。除了因法規規範遠距諮商只能服務18歲以上之民眾，即便大專校院也僅極少數獲准通過，罔顧廣大兒少與學生之身心健康。 
二、一國多制的通訊心理諮商審查標準，致使難以申請通過衛福部將遠距諮商的審核權力下放給地方衛生局，實務上產生的問題是各地標準不一，包含認定年齡（中央僅訂18歲、北中兩市為20歲）、初診適用性（中央可、北市不可）以及對於資安審查多有顧慮。 三、缺乏彈性的執業場所限制因《心理師法》第10條要求心理師執業以一處為限，在疫情嚴峻的情況下，即便已成功申請遠距諮商的單位，心理師們仍要冒著染疫風險前往執業所提供民眾服務，而忽略遠距諮商的特性與效益。  其他尚包括核准作業參考原則之法源依據、指定轉介單位…等諸多與實務脫節問題，有損民眾權益，待進一步研商，據上提出以下訴求： 一、疫情期間即刻實施遠距諮商免申請作業，統一經由地方公會造冊函報地方衛生局備查即可。 
二、讓未滿18歲兒少在有監護人同意下，亦可接受遠距諮商服務，且不應排除初次晤談。 
三、疫情期間心理師因應防疫政策，可不限於執業場所持續提供民眾遠距諮商服務。 
四、疫情過後衛福部應主動邀集各縣市衛生局與諮商專業團體重新研商部訂參考原則之適切性。
benefits_zh: 一、因應疫情，遠距諮商採免申請作業由公會統一造冊函報地方衛生局備查，即可讓心理諮商回歸服務量能，安頓民眾心理健康與生命安全。更重要的是，讓因疫情被迫中斷的民眾權益得到保障，以及因疫情而需要心理諮商服務的民眾，容易取得專業服務，有效緩解疫情期間之情緒壓力，預防家暴、自殺、藥酒癮等危機發生。 二、放寬遠距諮商服務的年齡與初次晤談之限制，不僅能照顧全國兒少學生之心理健康，更能使失學、體制外求學及使用校外心理諮商服務的兒少，甚至廣大民眾均可因此受惠。 三、疫情當前，准許執行遠距諮商的心理師不限於執業場所提供服務，有利於防疫政策落實外，亦可保障廣大民眾、心理師、心理師家人之安全。
proposer: 社團法人中華民國諮商心理師公會全國聯合會
proposal_en: On November 29, 2010, the Ministry of Health and Welfare promulgated the "Reference Principles for the Approval of Psychological Consultation Services for Psychologists" on November 29, 2018, and revised the regulations on July 29, 2019 in the Ministry of Health and Medical Zi No. 1091664405. The above-mentioned "Reference Principles for the Approval of Psychologists' Implementation of Communication Psychological Counseling Services" is an important regulation of this case, and is hereinafter referred to as "Reference Principles"; in addition, "Communication Psychological Counseling" is referred to as "distance counseling" to facilitate public understanding. According to the statistics of the National Association of Counseling Psychologists Association (hereinafter referred to as the National Counseling Association), more than 50,000 people across the country (hereinafter referred to as including students) have been forced to suspend psychological counseling due to the rising epidemic, including students at high risk of suicide, people with psychological trauma, and people with various existing issues. However, there are 123 psychological counseling centers and 81 psychological treatment centers in Taiwan, but less than 10% of them are actually approved by the Health Bureau to implement remote counseling. The difficulties faced are as follows: 1. The psychological counseling of 30,000 students across the country was forced to be interrupted. The national student psychological counseling has stopped interviews due to the epidemic. Telephone care and counseling cannot replace the effect of psychological counseling. In addition to laws and regulations, distance counseling can only serve people over the age of 18, and even colleges and universities are only approved by a very small number, regardless of the physical and mental health of children and students. 2. Multiple systems in one country make it difficult to apply for the approval of the Ministry of Health and Welfare to delegate the review power of remote counseling to local health bureaus. In practice, there are problems with different standards in different regions, including the age of identification (the central government only sets 18 years old, and the two cities in Beijing and Central China are 20 years old), the applicability of the first diagnosis (the central government can, but the Beijing city does not), and there are many concerns about information security review. 3. Inflexible restrictions on practice places. Article 10 of the "Psychologist Law" requires that psychologists practice only in one place. In the severe epidemic situation, even if the units that have successfully applied for remote consultation, psychologists still have to risk the risk of infection and go to the practice to provide public services, ignoring the characteristics and benefits of distance consultation. Others include the legal basis for the reference principle of the approval operation, the designation of the referral unit... and many other issues that are out of touch with practice, which will damage the rights and interests of the public. Further research and discussion are required. According to the above, the following appeals are made: 1. During the epidemic period, the remote consultation operation should be implemented immediately without application, and the local association can create a booklet and report it to the local health bureau for future reference. 2. Allow children under the age of 18 to receive teleconsultation services with the consent of their guardians, and the initial interview should not be ruled out. 3. During the epidemic period, in response to the epidemic prevention policy, psychologists may continue to provide remote consultation services for the public, not limited to the place of practice. 4. After the epidemic is over, the Ministry of Health and Welfare should take the initiative to invite the county and city health bureaus and consulting professional groups to re-discuss the appropriateness of the reference principles formulated by the Ministry.
title_en: In the current epidemic situation, the restrictions on communication (distance) psychological counseling should be relaxed, and the main points of reasonable approval work should be discussed

title_zh: 五歲幼兒免學費補助每年3萬元「直接補助家長」
proposal_zh:
1.五歲幼兒補助款，比照0-4歲育兒津貼模式每年3萬元（每月2500元），有第三胎者每年4.2萬(每月 
   3500元)直接補助給家長。 
2.請將自學家庭5歲幼兒也納入補助範圍。 
  
  
      針對五歲幼兒免學費補助原由私立幼兒園機構代辦申請轉發，建議教育部修正比照「育兒津貼」模式直接撥發補助款30,000元給家長，有第三胎者也可以每月再加發1000元(一年4.2萬)，同時納入長期以來未受政府照顧的在家自學家庭五歲幼兒，如此才能實踐與達成行政院賴清德院長指示「全面照顧、全部幼兒」的施政理念，亦能讓家長感受到中央政府0歲至入國民小學之幼兒「申請方式一致，補助標準一致」無斷層式的照顧。
benefits_zh:
教育部自100學年度起實施五歲幼兒免學費補助每年3萬元，然而「五歲幼兒免學費」原是立意良善的補助政策，全國各私立幼兒園全力配合政府辦理免學費發放政策，不因行政繁雜之工作壓力，全力協助政府為幼兒家長服務，辦理此項補助申請事宜至今。 
      然，私立幼兒園並未因此得到政府任何實質獎勵，多年以來私立幼兒園反成了媒體輿論競相踩踏的黑心機構，指責私幼成為政府圖利的對象，公共化比例的禍源，對此全國私立幼兒園無法承受與承擔此項污名罪責，卻未見政府主動公開澄清與說明補助照顧幼兒非私幼機構之政策，令人十分遺憾。 
      另，五歲幼兒免學費補助每年3萬元實施以來均排除在家自學之幼兒，其照顧政策產生遺漏與斷層，建議中央補助政策應採統一與連貫之方式，0歲至入國民小學之幼兒「申請方式一致，補助標準一致，且無斷層式的照顧」，配合108年度將實施之「育兒津貼」均採綜所稅率未達20%的家庭，每名0到4歲的兒童，每月可領新台幣2500元，第三胎以上每月再加發1000元，達成三贏始為全民之福！
proposal_en: 1. Subsidies for five-year-old children, compared with the childcare subsidy model for 0-4 years old, are 30,000 yuan per year (2,500 yuan per month), and those who have a third child will receive 42,000 yuan per year (3,500 yuan per month) directly to parents. 2. Please include 5-year-old children from self-study families into the subsidy scope. For five-year-old children’s tuition-free subsidy, which was originally applied and forwarded by private kindergarten institutions, it is recommended that the Ministry of Education revise the “childcare subsidy” model and directly allocate a subsidy of 30,000 yuan to parents. Those who have a third child can also receive an additional 1,000 yuan per month (42,000 yuan a year). At the same time, five-year-old children from home-school families who have not been cared for by the government for a long time can be implemented and achieved. The administrative concept of "comprehensive care for all children" instructed by President Lai Qingde of the Executive Yuan can also make parents feel the central government’s 0-year-old "The application method is the same, the subsidy standard is the same" and there is no gap in the care of children entering elementary schools.
title_en: Five-year-old children are exempted from tuition and subsidized 30,000 yuan per year "direct subsidy to parents"

title_zh: 政府應研擬政策在教育實習上給予學生實習補助津貼
proposal_zh:
提議內容： 
政府應擬訂政策給予實習學生補助津貼（以下稱為津貼），讓學生能更專心的在實習課程上。 
發起背景 
立法院於民國九十二年修正師資培育法，其中教育實習由一年縮短為半年，並取消教育部補助每月新台幣八千元津貼，除須繳納四學分的學分費，學生身份也由「實習老師」改為「實習學生」。 
以下分為四點分述之： 
第一：教育實習本身具工作性質 
法令規定學生須先通過教師資格考，而後銜接教育實習，學生在學期間已有實習課程及通過資格考的背景下，皆具備相對應的基礎知識與能力。實習內容包含上台授課（每週至少超過基本教學節數六分之一）、支援各處室與校內行政庶務等，且上下班時間比照正式老師，可知教育實習具備工作性質，對比其他考照執業如律師、醫師等，實習期間也都有薪資。 
第二：教育實習費用及成本高 
根據法令規定，每個月學生需要回原大學與指導教授開座談會。因在原大學附近租房及生活的成本通常較高，部分學生會因戶籍地的關係，選擇靠近家裡的學校，所以可能會有當日、多日往返北高此類之情形。在政府沒有津貼之下，另須負擔學分費、交通費、住宿費對於部分學生難以負荷。 
第三：因法規規定及時間考量下，難以額外打工 
在校實習時間約為早上8點至下午5點，有時候會有加班的需求（如班親會、開學典禮），若下班後額外打工將降低學習及教學品質，壓縮實習學生備課及準備教材的時間。 
實習法規第27條有提供學生能在學校代課或是課輔的機會，但代課機會較少且規定為3個月內之代課；另外實習學生專長項目的不同（如音樂科、家政科），並非所有人皆適合進行專門科目上的課輔。 
第四：給予實習學生津貼，能使實習學生更加專注 
根據我們回收的32個意見調查（可參考附加檔案1），大部分認為給予實習學生津貼，可使實習學生減緩經濟壓力，上班時更加專注於教育實習上，下班時也有餘裕時間能充分地備課、準備教材。 
  
綜合上述，我們認為給予實習補助津貼不只具備經濟層面、勞動層面上的正當性，在情意層面更能提升實習學生的學習動機，進一步轉化為實習成果，與未來正式師資的品質。 
透過津貼，也有助於減少師資培育中經濟條件的限制，進而促進階級流動，即使貧困家庭的子女(*註1)，仍可以擁有平等的機會。實習津貼推行成功，未來在制定或改善相關政策上，更能建立政府與人民良好溝通的基石。 
  
  
*註1：部分家庭情況不適用於「補助清寒實習學生助學金」
benefits_zh:
一、保障實習學生基礎生活，使上台教學品質更佳 
對於實習學生在此半年的負擔較不為沉重，不用在辦公時間外另尋額外的打工，並能更專心的在實習的課程準備上。 
二、佔教育部年度預算不到1% 
以109年~105年的教檢通過人數及109年教育部師資培育與藝術教育行政及督導來計算每個月進行4000元補助款，會佔預算約7%；而佔整體教育部預算比例不到1%（0.00089），總花費平均約為114,900千元。（*註2）  
  
*註2：計算方式為 當年度通過教檢人數*補助金額*6個月＝實習學生補助津貼總額（實習學生補助津貼總額）/（實習學生補助津貼總額＋109年該預算金額）＝佔該預算比例 
（詳細計算資料可參考下方附加檔案2）
proposal_en: Proposal content: The government should formulate a policy to give subsidy to intern students (hereinafter referred to as subsidy), so that students can concentrate more on the internship course. Initiation Background The Legislative Yuan amended the Teacher Training Law in 1992, which shortened the educational practice from one year to half a year, and canceled the NT$8,000 monthly subsidy from the Ministry of Education. In addition to paying the credit fee of four credits, the status of students was also changed from "trainee teacher" to "practice student". The following is divided into four points: First: Educational practice itself has a working nature. The law stipulates that students must first pass the teacher qualification examination, and then connect to educational practice. Students have already had internship courses during their studies and have passed the qualification examination. Under the background, they all have the corresponding basic knowledge and ability. The internship content includes teaching on stage (at least more than one-sixth of the basic teaching sessions per week), supporting various departments and school administrative affairs, etc., and the commuting time is compared with that of formal teachers. It can be seen that the educational internship has a working nature. Compared with other licensed practitioners such as lawyers and doctors, there are also salaries during the internship. Second: Educational practice fees and costs are high According to the law, students need to go back to the original university every month to have a seminar with the supervisor. Because the cost of renting a house and living near the original university is usually high, some students will choose a school close to their home due to the place of residence, so there may be situations such as commuting to and from Beigao on the same day or for multiple days. In the absence of government subsidies, credit fees, transportation fees, and accommodation fees have to be borne, which is difficult for some students. Third: Due to regulations and time considerations, it is difficult to work extra. The internship time in school is about 8:00 am to 5:00 pm. Sometimes there is a need to work overtime (such as family meetings, opening ceremonies). If you work extra after work, it will reduce the quality of learning and teaching, and shorten the time for intern students to prepare lessons and prepare textbooks. Article 27 of the Internship Regulations provides students with the opportunity to substitute or provide supplementary lessons at school, but there are few opportunities for substitute teaching and it is stipulated that they can substitute within 3 months; in addition, depending on the specialties of the intern students (such as music, home economics), not all students are suitable for supplementary courses in specialized subjects. Fourth: Giving intern students allowances can make intern students more focused. According to the survey of 32 opinions we collected (refer to attached file 1), most of them believe that granting intern student allowances can relieve the financial pressure of intern students. Based on the above, we believe that granting internship subsidies is not only justified on the economic and labor levels, but also can improve the learning motivation of intern students on the emotional level, which can be further transformed into internship results and the quality of future formal teachers. Through subsidies, it also helps to reduce the restrictions of economic conditions in teacher training, thereby promoting class mobility, and even children from poor families (*Note 1) can still have equal opportunities. The successful implementation of the internship subsidy will further establish the cornerstone of good communication between the government and the people in formulating or improving relevant policies in the future. *Note 1: Some family situations are not applicable to the "Subsidy for Underprivileged Internship Students"
title_en: The government should formulate a policy to give students internship subsidies and subsidies for educational internships

title_zh: 執行「車速分流」，取消「車種分流」
proposal_zh:
當時代與科技不斷的在進步時，法律和制度必須同時盡快跟上，才能確保人民的權益。
前提：

行駛在道路上之車種，都只是代步工具，不必分貴賤，現今以機車為大眾來做舉例。
尊重其他用路人之安全，道路應禮讓行人＞自行車＞機車＞重機＞小客車＞貨車＞大貨車以上等級為優先，受傷的總是越前面的。
部分用路人駕照用雞腿換，對其他用路人不友善。

正文：
　　民國67年禁行機車沿用至今，當時因機車機動性不高，為了加快車流，上下班尖峰時段禁行機車，而非全天候禁行；全球僅剩三個國家執行車種分流，台灣就是其中之一。如今機車機動性高，卻只能行駛最外側車道，必須和公車、計程車、路邊臨停車輛等爭道，是為機車族帶來安全，還是傷害？
　　在執行車速分流前，請務必將國民的交通素質提升再提升！高速公路就是一個車速分流的例子，但有發揮到車速分流的本質嗎？所以駕駛人才是關鍵，而不是車種，這有關教育、宣導、制裁、和民俗素養等；先不管改革，國民交通素質提升，為第一優先！
 
 
圖片出處：google圖片
引用連結文章:自由時報 「自由開講」澳洲國立大學博士生著
benefits_zh:
個人對道路的定義是，能從Ａ點快速到達Ｂ點如此而已，車速分流的重要就是舒緩交通壅塞，不是右轉車跟直行車卡在路口。
機車和重機，構造和性質相似，以下用二輪代稱

二輪能改善交通壅塞
二輪使用空間小，空間上可使用到極大化，雙贏啊！（ａ）車陣時可鑽車縫（ｂ）停車空間小（支持使用者付費）
二輪排放量小，沒冷氣，不會待速吹冷氣，造成不必要的空氣汙染
台灣文化離不開二輪，發揚光大不是更好？希望政府能帶好風向，我台灣人，我驕傲！
proposal_en: When the times and technology are constantly advancing, the law and the system must keep up as soon as possible in order to ensure the rights and interests of the people. Premise: All types of vehicles on the road are just means of transportation, and there is no distinction between high and low. Now we take motorcycles as an example for the public. Respect the safety of other passers-by, and the road should give way to pedestrians > bicycles > locomotives > heavy machinery > passenger cars > trucks > large trucks and above. Some passers-by's driver's licenses are exchanged for chicken legs, which is not friendly to other passers-by. Main text: The ban on locomotives in 1967 is still in use today. At that time, due to the low mobility of locomotives, in order to speed up the traffic flow, locomotives were banned during peak commuting hours instead of all-weather. There are only three countries in the world that implement the division of vehicle types, and Taiwan is one of them. Nowadays, motorcycles are highly maneuverable, but they can only drive in the outermost lane. They have to compete with buses, taxis, and vehicles parked on the side of the road. Does this bring safety or harm to motorcycle owners? Before implementing the speed diversion, please be sure to improve the traffic quality of the people! Expressway is an example of speed diversion, but has the essence of speed diversion been brought into play? So driving talent is the key, not the type of car, which is related to education, publicity, sanctions, and folk literacy, etc. Regardless of reform, improving the quality of national transportation is the first priority! Image source: google Image Citation Link Article: Liberty Times "Freedom to speak" by a doctoral student at Australian National University
title_en: Execute "vehicle speed split" and cancel "vehicle type split"
label: Transport

title_zh: 不再讓虐殺路邊毛孩子的人逍遙法外！台灣應效法先進國家設立「動保警察」
proposal_zh:
立法院在2017年4月三讀通過了動保法修正案，包括提高虐殺動物者刑罰與罰款，以及其他指標性立法。 
由此來看，確實是台灣在愛護動物上的一大進步。 
但事實上，虐殺動物行為卻未因此相應減少， 
幾乎每天，我們還是會在網上看到許多受虐動物的照片和影像：包括被橡皮筋勒住肚腹、生殖器，皮肉發臭腐爛的貓狗； 
被不當飼養而受傷、生病，甚至死亡的寵物； 
以及那些縱狗殺貓的無良人士......為什麼儘管嚴刑峻法了，我們仍無法遏制這些不人道的殘酷行為？是的，就和許多法律一樣，立了法卻無法確實有效執行， 
也許是警察們公務繁重，儘管設有調查隊處理相關案件， 
仍難以分出太多心力對付虐殺動物罪犯...... 
此外，全國各地依舊頻傳棄養寵物、購買寵物、捕食動物等行為， 
讓「人道」「愛護動物」在台灣，不過只是淪為美名與空話一場。因此，為了有效遏止虐殺動物行為，同時向社會大眾傳遞人道精神，並讓人民意志共同推動的法律能發揮作用， 
我們呼籲政府能參考歐洲先進國家作法，成立「動保警察」。
benefits_zh:
【設置「動保警察」的利益與影響】 
動保警察需要專職人員，而非任務編組， 
他們和一般警察一樣擁有執法權，且熟悉動物相關法規。 
例如荷蘭，荷蘭自從成立動保警察後， 
虐殺動物的舉報案件激增6成5，遏止虐殺動物行為有目共睹。 
而儘管虐待動物並不嚴重的挪威，也設有動保警察， 
首要目標即是，要確保這些對動物犯下嚴重罪刑的罪犯， 
獲得應有的起訴與制裁。也因此，其編制中還包括法律專業人員。 
  
還有一個特別的他山之石案例： 
德國是全球第一個將動保概念納入憲法的國家， 
在德國人眼中，虐待或棄養動物，就和我們所認知的偷竊、殺人等一樣是違法行為。 
也因此，德國人十分虐待動物案件的關注，不下於一般刑案。 
（或許不像台灣大多數媒體和社會大眾， 
因為罪犯可能為台大生才大肆關注溫州街殺貓案， 
但這樣的罪行，其實幾乎每天都在我們社會中上演，而大眾渾然不覺......）
proposal_en: In April 2017, the Legislative Yuan passed the Amendment to the Animal Protection Law, which included increased penalties and fines for animal cruelty, as well as other indicative legislation. From this point of view, it is indeed a big step forward in Taiwan's animal protection. But in fact, animal cruelty has not decreased accordingly. Almost every day, we still see many photos and videos of tortured animals on the Internet: including cats and dogs whose stomachs and genitals are strangled by rubber bands, with stinky and rotten flesh; Yes, just like many laws, the law cannot be effectively implemented after being enacted. Perhaps the police are busy with their duties. Although there is an investigation team to handle related cases, it is still difficult to devote too much energy to dealing with animal cruelty criminals... In addition, there are still frequent behaviors such as abandoning pets, buying pets, and preying on animals. Therefore, in order to effectively curb the killing of animals, and at the same time convey the spirit of humanity to the general public, and allow the laws jointly promoted by the will of the people to take effect, we call on the government to establish an "animal protection police" by referring to the practices of advanced European countries.
title_en: No longer let those who tortured and killed furry children on the roadside go unpunished! Taiwan should follow the example of advanced countries and set up "animal protection police"

BERTLabels: Labor policies and regulations in Taiwan
title_zh: 稅務革新 公開公正遴選納保官
proposal_zh:
根據財政部發布之納稅者權利保護官資格及選任要點，納保官由各區國稅局內人員中，挑選10年以上工作經驗、現任薦任8職以上、考績良好5年內有3年列甲等以上者擔任。請國稅局人員擔任人民的納保官是一點都不合理的。 
納保官應由具有獨立性的律師、會計師或教稅法學者擔任，才能展現我國民主精神 
納保官由國稅局人員擔任無非是官官相護的形式，無法令人民信服，因此納保官應由公平公正公開的方式遴選。
benefits_zh:
若公平公正公開遴選納保官，不僅能讓人民的納稅人權受到良好保護，更能讓人民更加信任法稅制度，建立政府與人民的和諧關係。 
更重要的是，納保官能促使稅務人員正當查稅，人民不再須要多繳稅金，就能活絡台灣經濟，創造台灣的工作機會，吸引外資來台，讓台灣經濟成長更快速，人民與國家皆能更富有。
proposal_en: According to the qualifications and selection points of the taxpayer rights protection officer issued by the Ministry of Finance, the taxpayer's rights protection officer shall be selected from the personnel of the State Taxation Bureau of each district with more than 10 years of work experience, more than 8 current positions recommended, and three years of good performance within five years. It is not reasonable at all to ask the IRS personnel to serve as the people's insurance officers. The security officer should be an independent lawyer, accountant or tax law scholar, in order to demonstrate the spirit of democracy in our country. The role of the security officer is nothing more than a form of mutual protection between officials and officials, which cannot convince the people. Therefore, the security officer should be selected in a fair, just and open manner.
title_en: Tax reform, open and fair selection of taxpayers

title_zh: 刪除政黨補助款，全民不買單！
proposal_zh:
選舉投一票還要付給他一票的錢，修法刪除吧！
依據《公職人員選舉罷免法》規定，全國立委選舉政黨得票率達3.5%以上者，每年每票補貼50元，至該屆立委任期屆滿為止。
依據2016年第9屆立委選舉政黨票結果，共有5個政黨過得票率達3.5％補助款門檻，民進黨是最大贏家，未來4年每年可獲2億6854萬多元補助。
這次立委選舉，共有5個政黨達到3.5％補助款門檻，民進黨未來每年可獲2億6854萬餘元、國民黨可年領1億6404萬餘元、親民黨可年領3974萬餘元。選舉結果獲佳績的時代力量，也可年領3721萬元。新黨雖無拿到立委席次，但得票率4.18%，也可年領2550萬餘元補助款。
http://www.chinatimes.com/realtimenews/20160117002420-260401
搞跨台灣經濟的是這些政黨補助款!!
benefits_zh:
第十四屆不分立委選舉政黨得票數跨越3.5%門檻者，
"每年"可獲得補助如下:
 民進黨268547650元
 親民黨  39741900元
 國民黨164047450元
 時代力量37215750元
 新    黨    25503700元
 總計一年要補助這些黨
共5億3仟5佰多萬元。
 四年就要21億4仟多萬元。
 難怪老百姓越來越辛苦。
 這樣的立委談什麼年金改革?
 拼命改別人，卻肥自己的政黨，可預見得未來各黨的黨產只會越來越多。
 難怪這次選舉有18個政黨出來分此大餅。還有要組新的政黨的？
啃噬你我老百姓的稅(血汗錢)。 
可悲呀…真正吃垮國庫財政的，是台灣人民們養出來的政客！
proposal_en: He has to be paid for one vote for one vote in the election, so let’s delete it by amending the law! According to the "Public Official Election and Recall Law", political parties with a vote rate of more than 3.5% in the national legislative elections will receive a subsidy of 50 yuan per vote per year until the term of the legislative committee expires. According to the results of the party votes in the 9th Legislative Election in 2016, a total of 5 political parties passed the 3.5% subsidy threshold. The DPP is the biggest winner, and will receive more than 268.54 million yuan in subsidies every year for the next 4 years. In this legislative election, a total of 5 political parties reached the 3.5% subsidy threshold. In the future, the DPP will receive more than 268.54 million yuan per year, the KMT will receive more than 164.04 million yuan per year, and the People First Party will receive more than 39.74 million yuan per year. The power of the times who have achieved good results in the election can also receive 37.21 million yuan a year. Although the new party did not get any seats in the Legislative Council, it won 4.18% of the votes and received more than 25.5 million yuan in annual subsidies. http://www.chinatimes.com/realtimenews/20160117002420-260401 It is these political party subsidies that are engaged in the cross-Taiwan economy!!
title_en: Delete political party subsidies, the whole people will not pay!

title_zh: 加入排除、保護BB槍之文字於槍砲20之一條修正草案
proposal_zh: 支持蘇院長打擊犯罪，阻止改造槍枝流通於市的施政作為。為能更明確的標定不法之徒手中的作案工具，為不波及敬軍愛警的生存遊戲玩家財產，不讓罪犯能輕易以「生存遊戲」當作藉口脫罪。因此希望能在槍砲彈藥刀械管制條例修正草案中第二十之一條的部分，加上經濟部建議之排除低動能遊戲槍(BB槍)的文字，以及建立官方與民間合作快速反應的審查機制。      建議明確加入二十之一條修正草案之文字如下...1. 定義部分，以低動能遊戲槍主管機關經濟部所提出的文字為主建議加入:「具類似真槍之外型、構造、材質及火藥式擊發機構裝置，為模擬槍，由中央主管機關會同中央目的事業主管機關公告查禁。但藉由壓縮氣體、壓縮二氧化碳、機械彈簧或電池推進彈丸之不具殺傷力低動能遊戲用槍，不在此限。」     2. 以官、產、學與人民團體組成之模擬槍評估審查委員會，共同協商對社會治安有疑慮的操作槍款，同時間民間單位可快速向官方反應目前新式有疑慮的槍種，可解決為規避管制而不斷變更設計的操作槍。同時也可避免再次讓善良合法玩家的財產、名譽受損，因此建議加入以下文字:「中央主管機關為核定模擬槍種類，應設模擬槍評估審查委員會。前項委員會之委員為無給職，設置辦法由中央主管機關訂定之。其中專家學者、低動能遊戲用槍人民團體與廠商等不具官方身分之代表，不得少於委員總人數三分之二。」
benefits_zh: 願加入兩項機制後能讓非法槍枝更快禁絕、合法玩家財產受到保障，更能持續發展產業，創造就業機會與外匯收入。
proposal_en: Support Dean Su's policy of fighting crime and preventing the circulation of guns in the city. In order to be able to more clearly mark the crime tools in the hands of criminals, so as not to affect the property of survival game players who respect the military and love the police, and prevent criminals from easily using "survival games" as an excuse to get rid of their crimes. Therefore, it is hoped that Article 21 of the draft amendment to the Regulations on the Control of Guns, Ammunition, and Knives can be added to the Ministry of Economic Affairs’ proposal to exclude low-energy game guns (BB guns), and to establish a review mechanism for rapid response to official and private cooperation. It is suggested to clearly add the text of Article 21 of the revised draft as follows... 1. In the definition part, the text proposed by the Ministry of Economic Affairs, the competent authority for low-kinetic game guns, is proposed to be added: "Similar to real guns in appearance, structure, material, and gunpowder-type firing mechanism, they are simulated guns. The simulated gun evaluation and review committee formed by the group jointly negotiates the operational gun models that have doubts about social security. At the same time, private units can quickly report the current new types of guns that are suspicious to the government, and can solve the problem of constantly changing the design of operational guns to avoid control. At the same time, it can also avoid damage to the property and reputation of good and legitimate players. Therefore, it is suggested to add the following text: "The central competent authority should set up a simulated gun evaluation and review committee to approve the types of simulated guns. The members of the committee in the preceding paragraph are not paid, and the establishment method shall be determined by the central competent authority. Among them, representatives of experts, scholars, people's groups and manufacturers of low-kinetic game guns who do not have official status shall not be less than two-thirds of the total number of committee members."
title_en: Adding the text of excluding and protecting BB guns to the draft amendment of Guns 20

title_zh: 推動臺灣手語納入語言早療
proposal_zh:
1.建請政府將臺灣手語納入語言治療相關輔助，為聽損兒打造溝通無障礙的友善環境。 
 2.提供手語早療資訊，讓父母有多樣性選擇。 
 3.行文推廣各醫療院所、早療單位、機構增設手語為早療項目之一，使語言早療不再單一口語治療。
benefits_zh:
有鑑於大部分的聽損兒來自聽人家庭，嬰幼兒時期聽人父母無法使用語言做為溝通橋樑，導致聽損兒理解力低落與延誤語言治療時機的機率大增。 
  
其實手語、口語雙語教學是能並行不悖的，又能解決使用電子耳、助聽器溝通上相關限制。 
  
且《國家語言發展法》第三條表示，所稱國家語言，係指臺灣各固有族群使用之自然語言及臺灣手語。 
  
既然臺灣手語是國家語言之一，口語治療也使用法定語言中文，外加上聽覺語言的口語與視覺語言的手語本質上有所不同，所以臺灣手語應納入兒童語言治療一環。
proposal_en: 1. It is recommended that the government incorporate Taiwanese sign language into language therapy-related aids to create a barrier-free and friendly environment for hearing-impaired children. 2. Provide sign language early treatment information, so that parents have a variety of choices. 3. The writing promotes the addition of sign language as one of the early treatment items in medical institutions, early treatment units, and institutions, so that early language treatment is no longer a single oral language treatment.
title_en: Promote the inclusion of Taiwanese sign language in early language therapy

title_zh: 統一並修正玩具槍殺傷力標準檢測方式  杜絕民眾因政府機關標準不一而慘遭入罪
proposal_zh:
全球玩具槍逾半數是台灣製造，每年出口額約卅億，產量居世界第一，目前國內玩具槍廠商超過卅家。但是我國對於玩具槍的相關法規卻極為缺乏，僅能適用《槍砲彈藥刀械管制條例》。經濟部標準檢驗局、財政部關務署、內政部警政署各自為政，沒有統一標準，而統一標準應盡快訂定 
1.經濟部標準檢驗局與內政部警政署的玩具槍殺傷力檢驗標準應盡快訂出一個統一的標準 
不應出現經濟部標準檢驗局允許，而警政署認為有殺傷力的情況。經濟部與內政部同為中華民國政府管轄部會，為何有兩套標準？民眾與廠商到底該依據哪套標準？ 
2.內政部警政署應禁止由警方對被檢測玩具進行改裝 
民眾合法購買取得經檢驗後合法玩具槍、廠商製造銷售經檢驗後合法玩具槍，而警方改裝後具殺傷力是受測者違法還是警方違法? 因此，警方在查扣玩具槍後，不得自行改裝。 
3.內政部警政署應檢討使用廿二公斤瓦斯瓶與鋼珠彈檢測與其他單位檢測方式不同是否適洽? 
經濟部標準檢驗局與內政部警政署檢測方法不同，造成民眾將可合法取得警方檢測為具有殺傷力的由廠商製造經濟部認可的合法玩具槍。兩套標準造成民眾與廠商無所適從。兩個單位應訂定相同檢測方式。 
4.內政部警政署在測試民眾的玩具槍後，造成毀損的賠償責任劃定 
現行警政署測試方法使用鋼珠彈進行殺傷力測試，但鋼珠彈在玩具槍的精密管內使用會造成損壞，如檢測後為未違反<槍砲彈藥刀械管制條例>，警方應負擔全額賠償責任。使用22KG瓦斯測試時，可能會造成原本就是設計使用12公斤瓦斯的玩具槍受損。如檢測後為未違反<槍砲彈藥刀械管制條例>，那麼受損的玩具槍，也應由警方負擔全額賠償責任。
benefits_zh:
1.建立統一標準，台灣玩具槍廠商未來可避免製造出有違法之虞的產品 
2.杜絕警方改裝扣押玩具槍，保障守法民眾。 
3.訂定相同檢測方式，結束兩單位不同調。讓APS CAM870事件不再發生，可在進口前先行阻止。而非民眾合法取得由經濟部核可進口的合法玩具槍，卻因警政署檢測方式不同而誤觸《槍砲彈藥刀械管制條例》。 
4.訂定賠償責任劃分，保障守法民眾財產權 
最重要的是:保障《玩具槍製造》這項台灣之光的產業在台灣得以發展
proposal_en: More than half of the world's toy guns are made in Taiwan, with an annual export value of about 3 billion, and its output ranks first in the world. Currently, there are more than 30 domestic toy gun manufacturers. However, my country's relevant laws and regulations on toy guns are extremely lacking, and only the "Regulations on the Control of Guns, Ammunition, and Knives" can be applied. The Bureau of Standards and Inspection of the Ministry of Economic Affairs, the Customs Administration of the Ministry of Finance, and the Police Department of the Ministry of the Interior are independent, and there is no unified standard. The unified standard should be established as soon as possible. The Ministry of Economic Affairs and the Ministry of the Interior are both ministries under the jurisdiction of the ROC government. Why are there two sets of standards? Which set of standards should the public and manufacturers follow? 2. The Police Department of the Ministry of the Interior should prohibit the police from modifying the tested toys. People legally buy and obtain legal toy guns after inspection, manufacturers manufacture and sell legal toy guns after inspection, and the lethality after the police modification is illegal for the testers or the police? Therefore, the police are not allowed to modify the toy guns after they are seized. 3. The Police Department of the Ministry of the Interior should review whether it is appropriate to use 22kg gas cylinders and steel ball bombs in different testing methods from other units? The Bureau of Standards and Inspection of the Ministry of Economic Affairs and the Police Department of the Ministry of the Interior have different testing methods, resulting in the public being able to legally obtain legal toy guns manufactured by manufacturers approved by the Ministry of Economic Affairs that are detected by the police as lethal. The two sets of standards have caused confusion among the public and manufacturers. The two units should specify the same testing method. 4. The Police Department of the Ministry of the Interior has determined liability for damages caused by testing the toy guns of the public. The current test method of the Police Department uses steel ball bullets for lethality testing, but the use of steel ball bullets in the precision tubes of toy guns will cause damage. When testing with 22KG gas, it may cause damage to the toy gun that was originally designed to use 12 kg of gas. If the inspection does not violate the "Regulations on the Control of Guns, Ammunition, and Knives", then the police should also be responsible for the full compensation for the damaged toy guns.
title_en: Unify and revise the standard detection method of toy gun lethality to prevent people from being criminalized due to different standards of government agencies

BERTLabels: Reforms to Taiwan's criminal justice system
title_zh: 監所管理員及法警的危險加給比照＜警察人事管理條例＞之標準訂之並調整
proposal_zh:
近年來監所管理員及法警被人犯攻擊受傷事件屢見不鮮 
從事矯正工作及人犯開庭的法警，終日與人犯、抗議民眾為伍。因勤務特殊、工作時間長、壓力大又具危險性，其危險程度不亞於警察，甚至今年還有監所管理員疑似加班過勞致死案例。 
近年來，發生攻擊監所管理員及法警事件導致受傷流血，比例更是逐年大量增加，從事都是危及生命的工作。監所管理員及法警值勤時間，也比一般正常公務人員超出太多，工作與待遇本身不對稱，有必要比照＜警察人事管理條例＞調高危險加給，使法警及監所人員的工作上付出相對合理化。 
監所人員及法警在增支專業加給或危險加給均未獲准<均以未編列待遇準備經費或基於整體考量原則，未予以調整>從未正式或重視基層人員之心聲與訴求，試問這樣對待，對於監所、檢院的基層同仁公平嗎？
benefits_zh:
監所管理員及法警危險加給20年沒調漲 
監所人員與法警的危險津貼僅3000、2700元，遠低於保警人員，甚至從事較安全的警察內勤人員，都比在現場戒護人犯的監所人員及法警高。嚴重打擊監所人員及法警士氣，造成年年離職率比所有公務機關高出很多，並衍生內部矛盾，應將之「公平化」。法警至監獄帶人犯出庭及還押或夜間看守、監所人員與人犯一起生活，卻跟一樣從事戒護工作的移民署，收容事務大隊執行收容戒護的專業人員，每人每月的「危險職務加給」（專業加給）有8435元，但監所管理員及法警每人每月卻只有3000、2700元，危險加給卻比不上移民署，實不公平！
proposal_en: In recent years, incidents of prison administrators and bailiffs being attacked and injured by criminals have become common occurrences. The bailiffs who are engaged in correctional work and criminal courts work with criminals and protesters all day long. Due to the special duty, long working hours, high pressure and danger, the degree of danger is no less than that of the police. Even this year, there was a death case of a prison administrator who was suspected of working overtime. In recent years, there have been incidents of attacks on prison administrators and judicial police that resulted in injuries and bleeding, and the proportion has increased significantly year by year. All of them are life-threatening jobs. Prison administrators and bailiffs are also on duty much longer than normal civil servants, and the work and benefits are asymmetrical. It is necessary to increase the risk bonus in accordance with the "Police Personnel Management Regulations" to make the work of the bailiffs and prison personnel relatively reasonable. Prison personnel and bailiffs were not allowed to increase their professional allowance or risk allowance (they were not prepared for treatment or based on the principle of overall consideration, and no adjustments were made) and have never formalized or paid attention to the aspirations and demands of grassroots personnel. Is this treatment fair to grassroots colleagues in prisons and procuratorates?
title_en: The dangers of prison administrators and judicial police are set and adjusted according to the standards of the "Regulations on Police Personnel Management"

BERTLabels: Labor policies and regulations in Taiwan
title_zh: 改善醫檢師工作過量的情況、更改合理的醫檢人力計算方式
proposal_zh:
以病人安全為中心、保障病人檢驗的品質是應該是所有醫檢師任職的中心思想， 
但一直以來除了檢驗量不斷增加以及評鑑、認證等非臨床性工作增加等因素， 
醫檢師早已面臨了工作量過多、品質不斷降低且許多地方已開始面臨找不到醫檢師的窘境， 
即使國內有充足的醫檢人力， 
但因為過量的工作無法兼顧品質之下， 
往往會造成一些醫療上的糾紛嚴重甚至會造成病患死亡， 
變成沒有人願意在臨床與前線工作， 
沒有好的品質對病人及國家均為重大的損失。 
我們只期待在公平、合理及符合現況的人力計算方式下， 
來保障病人就醫安全及醫檢師應有之工作權與合理的勞動環境。 
我們呼籲政府除履行責任要求醫院與所有資方遵行《職業安全衛生法》給予所有醫事人員合理的勞動環境， 
我們有以下幾點訴求： 
  
1. 更改醫檢師人力計算公式，以實際檢驗量用來換算人力，而非醫院床位數換算人力。 
醫檢師服務的對象本來就包含門急診以及所有住院病患，不應採用急性床數作為人力計算之公式，應以檢驗量(或核發報告量)作為計算之基礎才正確。 
  
2. 超過上限所簽核的檢驗報告健保一律不給付所有相關費用。 
為確保醫院與資方能遵守此基本規則，不讓醫檢人力過勞，應有相對措施作為限制條件。 
  
3. 檢驗量與醫檢師人數比例納入醫院評鑑與勞動稽查之項目。 
無論檢驗所或醫療院所都應遵守該原則，亦應訂立出相對應罰則。 
  
4. 檢驗結果雲端上傳補助金，應直接核撥給發報告醫檢師，而非醫院或資方，或建立補助金流向追蹤制度確保資金流向。 
  
5. 醫檢師操作所有檢驗、透過專業判斷才可核發病患報告用以診斷，且亦有一定醫療風險，故根據檢驗報告數量應有檢驗費。 
如同醫師有診療費、藥師有藥事服務費、護理有護理費......等。 
  
6. 醫檢部門之最高主管與部門主管均應由合格之醫檢師擔任，而非其他其他職系。 
醫檢部分無論是檢驗專業、異常判斷、品質管理、教學研究等問題應將專業交由該領域專業的人負責，目前台灣醫檢學會已有專門領域醫檢師之認證與展延。 
  
7. 任職行政類或非發報告之醫檢人員，不應列入醫檢師人力計算總數。 
  
8. 應由合格之醫檢師執行檢體採集、運送、操作以及保管等項目。 
因檢體品質對於檢驗報告的影響甚鉅，許多醫檢師往往無法在第一線監控檢體採集過程是否合乎標準、採檢種類是否正確或者是否遭受汙染等問題，故建議應由醫檢師執行檢體採集至和發報告後保存，方可保持良好的檢驗品質。
benefits_zh:
1.提升檢驗品質，改善病人就醫安全、減少醫療糾紛與醫療意外。 
2.改善血汗醫檢師就業情形，提高醫檢師就業意願及執業率。 
3.提升國內檢驗水平，有足夠人力才能真正落實所有認證與評鑑之標準流程。  
4. 減少檢驗錯誤率。 
（以上均為政治決定，請有政治責任的政務官代表政府回答，是否採納或不採納的結論，選民自然會用選票來回應。）
proposal_en: Taking patient safety as the center and ensuring the quality of patient examinations should be the central idea of ​​all medical examiners. However, in addition to the continuous increase in the number of inspections and the increase in non-clinical work such as evaluation and certification, medical examiners have long been faced with excessive workload and declining quality. Many places have begun to face the dilemma of not being able to find medical examiners. Even if there is sufficient medical examination manpower in the country, the excessive work cannot take care of quality, which often leads to serious medical disputes and even death of patients. Work without good quality is a great loss to patients and the country. We only expect to protect the safety of patients, the right to work and a reasonable working environment for medical examiners under a fair, reasonable and current manpower calculation method. We call on the government to fulfill its responsibilities and require hospitals and all employers to comply with the "Occupational Safety and Health Law" to provide a reasonable working environment for all medical personnel. We have the following appeals: 1. Change the formula for calculating the manpower of medical examiners, and use the actual number of inspections to convert manpower instead of the number of hospital beds. The objects served by medical examiners originally include outpatient and emergency patients and all inpatients. The number of acute beds should not be used as the formula for manpower calculation, and the calculation should be based on the number of inspections (or the number of issued reports). 2. If the inspection report exceeds the upper limit, the health insurance will not cover all related expenses. In order to ensure that hospitals and capital can abide by this basic rule and prevent the medical examination manpower from being overworked, there should be relative measures as restrictions. 3. The number of inspections and the ratio of the number of medical examiners are included in the items of hospital evaluation and labor inspection. Both laboratory and medical institutions should abide by this principle, and should formulate corresponding penalties. 4. The subsidy for uploading the test results to the cloud should be directly approved and allocated to the medical examiner who issued the report, not the hospital or the employer, or a subsidy flow tracking system should be established to ensure the flow of funds. 5. Medical examiners operate all the tests and verify the patient reports for diagnosis only through professional judgment, and there are certain medical risks, so there should be test fees based on the number of test reports. Just like doctors have diagnosis and treatment fees, pharmacists have pharmaceutical service fees, nursing has nursing fees...etc. 6. The top supervisor and department head of the medical examination department should be qualified medical examiners, not other grades. In the medical examination part, whether it is inspection specialty, abnormal judgment, quality management, teaching and research, etc., the professional should be handed over to the professional in this field. At present, the Taiwan Medical Examination Association has certified and extended the certification of medical examiners in specialized fields. 7. Medical examiners who work as administrative staff or do not issue reports shall not be included in the total number of medical examiner manpower calculations. 8. Specimen collection, transportation, manipulation and storage should be carried out by qualified medical examiners. Because the quality of the sample has a great impact on the test report, many medical examiners are often unable to monitor whether the sample collection process is up to standard, whether the type of test is correct, or whether it is contaminated. Therefore, it is recommended that the medical examiner should carry out the collection of the sample and store it after the report is issued, so as to maintain a good test quality.
title_en: Improve the overwork of medical examiners and change the reasonable calculation method of medical examination manpower

title_zh: 建立真正健全的中醫畢業後臨床訓練制度，廢除目前混亂不堪的中醫醫療機構負責醫師訓練計畫
proposal_zh:
1)鑒於目前中醫醫療機構負責醫師訓練計畫強硬推行之後，主訓、共訓、代訓夾雜造成制度混亂、訓練容額不足遠遠不能滿足受訓需求等問題已至積重難返的地步，不利於中醫的健全發展，有必要即刻停止該計畫，重新建立健全的中醫畢業後臨床訓練制度。  
  
2)為使中醫有健全發展的環境，主管機關有義務保障新進中醫師接受畢業後臨床訓練的機會並取得負責醫師資格。 
  
3)盤點每年確實可提供的畢業後臨床訓練容額，中醫、學士後中醫學系年度總招生名額訂為訓練容額的90%，確保畢業之後的新進中醫師有接受畢業後臨床訓練並取得負責醫師資格的權利，訓練容額的10%提供給未於畢業當年即受訓的中醫師。 
  
4)鑒於目前中醫、學士後中醫學系的年度總招生名額已超過畢業後臨床訓練容額甚鉅，全台的中醫、學士後中醫學系有減招之必要。 
  
5)在中醫、學士後中醫學系減招達成、真正健全的中醫畢業後臨床訓練制度實行之前，因目前中醫醫療機構負責醫師訓練計畫問題重重、弊端叢生、窒礙難行，已至危害中醫健全發展的地步，終止計畫實行實有必要，在此過渡期，99年衛署醫字第0990263030號第二項之中「...中華民國一百零三年一月一日起，為經教學醫院評鑑合格醫院之中醫部門及經中央主管機關評定得辦理中醫醫療機構負責醫師訓練計畫之中醫醫院...」之規定有更正廢止的必要，回歸99年衛署醫字第0990263030號生效之前行之有效的舊制，輔以其他教學措施以強化新進中醫師的臨床能力。 
  
6)未來健全的中醫畢業後臨床訓練制度的相關內容須取得中醫各界(包括訓練者及受訓者)的共識，使訓練能真正滿足新進中醫師臨床之所需，而非僅是訓練機構的低階人力，從事於瑣碎無聊的雜務或斤斤從事於對臨床能力幫助不大的文書作業。使新進中醫師的臨床能力能真正得到提升以滿足台灣社會的醫療需求。
benefits_zh: 中醫作為醫療的一環，有效地保障不少台灣民眾的健康。隨著時代的進步，中醫的臨床訓練制度自然應與時俱進。但在103年台灣政黨輪替之前台灣中醫藥政策的主事者卻昧於訓練經費不足、訓練機構提供的容額不足以滿足受訓需求等現實，制度施行的條件未得到確保，不顧質疑的聲浪破壞行之有年的舊制，中醫醫療機構負責醫師訓練計畫強硬上馬，當初預料的惡果很快出現，相當多的新進中醫師得不到訓練的機會，人心惶惶，不到一半得以擠進受訓窄門的新進中醫師也因僧多粥少，權益受損淪為受訓機構的低階人力，過勞等現象也隨之出現。為增加訓練容額以減少不滿聲浪，共訓、代訓、群組訓、診所主訓等名詞頻出，除了使制度更加混亂不堪，令人無所適從之外，對問題的解決助益不大。中醫醫療機構負責醫師訓練計畫自實行以來至今有三年，已證明此計畫問題重重、弊端叢生，對台灣中醫的健全發展不但無益反有害(相關的弊端可以參考參考所附的pdf檔文件)，故有必要廢止該計畫，重頭建立健全的中醫畢業後臨床訓練制度。亡羊補牢猶未晚矣，希望政府在政黨輪替之後，能有魄力廢除舊時不合理的政策，使台灣中醫更能健全發展，民眾的醫療福祉更能得到保障。
proposal_en: 1) In view of the fact that after the tough implementation of the training plan for physicians in charge of medical institutions of traditional Chinese medicine, the system confusion caused by main training, co-training, and substitute training, and the insufficient training capacity is far from meeting the training needs and other problems have been accumulated to such an extent that it is not conducive to the sound development of Chinese medicine. It is necessary to stop the plan immediately and re-establish a sound clinical training system for post-graduation Chinese medicine. 2) In order to provide a sound environment for the development of TCM, the competent authority is obliged to ensure that new TCM doctors have the opportunity to receive post-graduation clinical training and obtain the qualifications of responsible physicians. 3) Take stock of the post-graduation clinical training capacity that can be provided every year. The annual total enrollment quota of TCM and post-baccalaureate TCM departments is set at 90% of the training capacity to ensure that new Chinese medicine practitioners after graduation have the right to receive post-graduation clinical training and obtain the qualification of a responsible physician. 10% of the training capacity is provided to TCM physicians who were not trained in the year of graduation. 4) In view of the fact that the current total annual enrollment of TCM and post-baccalaureate TCM departments has exceeded the post-graduation clinical training capacity, it is necessary to reduce the number of TCM and post-baccalaureate TCM departments in Taiwan. 5) Before the reduction of enrollment of TCM and post-baccalaureate TCM departments and the implementation of a truly sound post-graduate TCM clinical training system, the current TCM medical institution responsible physician training program has many problems, numerous drawbacks, and impediments to the point of endangering the sound development of TCM. It is necessary to terminate the implementation of the plan. During this transitional period, in 1999, the Department of Health’s Medical Zi No. 0990263030, Item 2 "...From January 1, 103 of the Republic of China, TCM departments and managers of hospitals that have passed the evaluation of teaching hospitals It is necessary to revise and abolish the provisions of the Central Competent Authority’s evaluation of TCM hospitals that can handle TCM medical institutions in charge of physician training programs. It is necessary to return to the old system that was effective before the 1999 Health Administration Medical Zi No. 0990263030 came into effect, supplemented by other teaching measures to strengthen the clinical capabilities of new TCM physicians. 6) The relevant content of the future sound post-graduation clinical training system of Chinese medicine must obtain the consensus of all walks of life in Chinese medicine (including trainers and trainees), so that the training can truly meet the clinical needs of new Chinese medicine practitioners, rather than just low-level manpower of training institutions engaged in trivial and boring chores or clerical work that is of little help to clinical ability. So that the clinical ability of new Chinese medicine practitioners can be truly improved to meet the medical needs of Taiwanese society.
title_en: Establish a truly sound post-graduation clinical training system for TCM and abolish the currently chaotic TCM medical institution responsible physician training program

title_zh: 廢除「股利扣抵率減半」政策，恢復昔日全額扣抵
proposal_en: Normal 0 0 2 MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 /* Style Definitions */ table.MsoNormalTable {mso-style-name: table content; mso-tstyle-rowband-size: 0; mso-tstyle-colband-size: 0; mso-style-noshow: yes; mso-style-parent: ""; mso-padding-alt: 0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt; mso-para-margin:0cm; mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt; mso-pagination:widow-orphan; font-size:10.0pt; font-family:"Times New Roman"; Taking cash dividends as an example, the stock price will be directly deducted from the stock price after ex-dividend. Shareholders only get back part of the money that was originally reflected in the stock price. Unless the interest is fully paid, otherwise there is no profit at all. It is unreasonable to require stockholders to use their "income" that has no actual profit to declare comprehensive income tax, and the dividend deduction rate can only be halved. It is unreasonable, and the ex-dividend of stocks may not be able to fill the interest rate.
title_en: Abolish the policy of "halving the dividend deduction rate" and restore the previous full deduction

title_zh: 為改善癌症新藥只能做給有錢人用之制度困境，提議建立「癌症輔助治療功能性食品」項目。
proposal_zh:
癌症新藥只能做給有錢人用？ 
  
2014年我參加一場在杭州舉辦的「世界癌症大會」，在那場癌症防治領域的報告中有許多癌症新藥研發的學術報告，最後一位報告者是來自印度的學者，他一上台開宗明義地說：許多新藥的研究很創新也很好，但很可惜的是我來自印度，尚有很多同胞每天所得不到1元美金，這些藥他們都用不起！我能為我的同胞所做最大貢獻，是從他們買得起的周遭食物，從中研究讓他們得以緩解的自然物。 
  
事實上，東方醫學很早就知道「最好的藥房就在家裡的廚房」，自然物當中確實有許多透過科學實驗，可以對於癌症輔助治療的物質，只是必須研究多少劑量足以得到效果。然而，承襲西方醫學藥品的制度，若要把一項化學或自然物質變成可以主張作為「癌症防治」的醫藥產品，從安全性實驗、細胞實驗、動物實驗、到三期的大規模人體臨床實驗，耗費上百億台幣絕對不是新聞。也因此，癌症新藥只要未能納入健保給付，一年自費上百萬甚至數百萬費用都是正常的。於是在現有制度下，癌症標靶藥動輒每月10餘萬，「癌症新藥只能做給有錢人用」就成了制度的必然！ 
  
台灣與其他若干國家在自然物的「健康食品制度」上曾經做過努力，讓一些透過科學實驗，能夠在動物實驗中證明類似「調節免疫力」、「調解血脂」、「改善腸胃」功能等食品，可以主張部分的功能性效果。由於不必投入大筆的人體臨床實驗費用，所以就有機會在相對便宜的價格下，提供大家作為保健或者輔助治療的產品。然而，這當中並沒有「輔助癌症治療」的項目，使得要花費最高的癌症族群，反而無法成為這項美意的受惠者。 
  
當然，若要成為「輔助癌症治療」的健康食品也必然不能與上述的慢性病等量齊觀，原因是癌症患者動輒致命，必須非常謹慎小心。坦白說，動物實驗有效當然不能主張人體實驗一定有效，也因此要做到「輔助癌症治療」的健康食品，至少要達成完整的安全性實驗與在醫學中心較小規模的人體二期確效實驗。無論規模如何，重點在於必須達到統計上的顯著效果（越小規模要達成顯著統計意義越難）。若制度能做如此改善，極有可能可以在一年花費10餘萬以下的金額，讓癌症患者獲得很好的輔助治療效果。 
  
以目前制度而言，衛生機關若遇到學界努力研發自然物，而有新的突破證據，甚至做到人體實驗達成統計意義還發表國際期刊，只要成為新聞或者對外發表，衛生機關都「被迫」必須嚴重關切，卻形同對學界研究與落實產品發展的桎梏。如果大家有興趣，上YouTube搜尋「食物是一天三餐最好的化療 」，就會發現一場TED的醫學實驗演講，證明有不少自然物攝取足量，或以萃取足量方式，確實在抑制癌症血管新生有很好的效果。但若換成在台灣現有制度下，有人往此方向努力，恐怕免不了要被戴上「誇大療效」的大帽子。 
  
台灣是科技之島，更是勇於創新之國！在政府積極發展生技產業與加強照顧人民健康的政策下，我們殷切期盼政府應該勇於改變制度！積極將健康食品制度中增加「輔助癌症治療」的功能性食品項目，以嘉惠眾多的癌症患者與家屬！
benefits_zh: 若未來此提案成真，由於在醫學中心達成人體二期實驗達到統計意義的花費，比起必須完成人體三期大規模實驗之經費大幅下降。使得達到此項目標的「功能性食品項目」得以價格大幅下降，將使得許多非屬富裕之家庭，有機會使用該產品提高化放療之生活品質或抑制癌細胞之擴散。此對於降低健保之花費，以及病患、家人之生活品質與負擔，有極大之影響。
proposal_en: New cancer drugs can only be used by the rich? In 2014, I participated in a "World Cancer Conference" held in Hangzhou. In the report on cancer prevention and treatment, there were many academic reports on the research and development of new cancer drugs. The last speaker was a scholar from India. As soon as he took the stage, he said clearly: many new drug researches are very innovative and very good, but it is a pity that I am from India. There are still many compatriots who receive less than US$1 a day, and they cannot afford these drugs! The greatest service I can do to my fellow man is to study the natural objects that provide them with relief from the food around them that they can afford. In fact, Eastern medicine has known for a long time that "the best pharmacy is in the kitchen at home". There are indeed many natural substances that can be used as adjuvant therapy for cancer through scientific experiments, but it is necessary to study how much dosage is enough to get the effect. However, following the system of Western medical medicine, it is definitely not news that tens of billions of Taiwan dollars will be spent on safety tests, cell experiments, animal experiments, and three-phase large-scale human clinical trials to turn a chemical or natural substance into a medical product that can be claimed as "cancer prevention and treatment." Therefore, as long as new cancer drugs are not included in the health insurance benefits, it is normal to pay millions or even millions of dollars a year out of pocket. Therefore, under the current system, targeted cancer drugs cost more than 100,000 yuan per month, and "new cancer drugs can only be used by the rich" has become a necessity of the system! Taiwan and some other countries have made efforts in the "healthy food system" of natural products, so that some scientific experiments can prove in animal experiments that functions such as "regulating immunity", "regulating blood lipids", and "improving the stomach" can claim some functional effects. Since there is no need to invest a large amount of human clinical trials, there is an opportunity to provide products for health care or adjuvant therapy at a relatively cheap price. However, there is no "adjuvant cancer treatment" project, so that the cancer group with the highest cost cannot be the beneficiary of this kindness. Of course, if it is to become a healthy food that "aids cancer treatment", it must not be on the same level as the above-mentioned chronic diseases. The reason is that cancer patients are often fatal and must be very cautious. Frankly speaking, the effectiveness of animal experiments certainly does not mean that human experiments must be effective. Therefore, to achieve a healthy food that "aids cancer treatment", at least a complete safety experiment and a smaller-scale human phase II confirmation experiment in a medical center must be completed. Regardless of the size, the point is that it must be statistically significant (the smaller the size the harder it is to achieve statistical significance). If the system can be improved in this way, it is very possible to spend less than 100,000 yuan a year to allow cancer patients to obtain good adjuvant treatment effects. According to the current system, if the health authorities encounter the academic circles' efforts to research and develop natural products, and there are new breakthrough evidences, or even achieve statistical significance in human experiments and publish international journals, as long as they become news or publish to the outside world, the health authorities will be "forced" to be seriously concerned, but it is like a shackle to the academic research and implementation of product development. If you are interested, go to YouTube and search for "Food is the best chemotherapy for three meals a day", and you will find a TED medical experiment speech, which proves that many natural substances are indeed effective in inhibiting cancer angiogenesis when taken in sufficient amounts or extracted in sufficient amounts. However, if someone works hard in this direction under Taiwan's current system, I'm afraid they will inevitably be labeled as "exaggerating the curative effect". Taiwan is an island of science and technology, and it is also a country of innovation! Under the government's policy of actively developing the biotechnology industry and strengthening care for people's health, we earnestly hope that the government will have the courage to change the system! Actively add the functional food item of "assisting cancer treatment" to the health food system to benefit many cancer patients and their families!
title_en: In order to improve the institutional dilemma that new cancer drugs can only be used by the rich, it is proposed to establish a "functional food for cancer adjuvant therapy" project.

title_zh: 衛生福利部公告之特定疾病配方食品應由營養師專責銷售
proposal_zh:
1.醫療領域依專業分工行事方為共識，故醫師診斷疾病、藥師調劑及販售藥物、營養師專責處理食品營養範疇實屬最佳，且營養師於營養專業的養成相較於其他醫療人員必定紮實且深厚，因此對於營養品的建議無疑是較精確 
2.故建議特定疾病配方食品的販售應由營養師執行，因特定疾病配方食品的種類繁多，營養師之專業訓練判斷方能提供最適宜之建議給患者食用 
3.建議只要有販售特定疾病配方食品之場所，應至少配置一位專責營養師人力來販售及提供民眾諮詢欲購買特定疾病配方食品之疑問
benefits_zh:
一般而言，特定疾病配方食品係指因病人生理功能失調，致無法正常進食、消化、吸收或代謝一般食品或食品中特定營養成分，或醫學上認定有其他特殊營養需求，且不易透過日常飲食調整所獲取，而依據其適用對象特別加工或配製之食品。由上述可知，選擇合適之特定疾病配方食品對食用者身體健康影響巨大，因應疾病種類之不同甚至是疾病進展階段之差異，於營養素攝取原則上必然亦有不同。換言之，特定疾病配方食品的選擇直接關乎患病者之健康狀態與疾病進展，因此若選擇營養品時即由營養師進行把關，不僅可提供最適產品之選擇，還能及時衛教使用方法及專業知識外，亦能避免販售人員及除營養師之外醫事人員因不夠了解而誤給建議，造成額外身體及各項醫療負擔。期刊Journal of the American Dietetic Association於2006年時曾發表一篇文獻是探討有遵循營養師建議的營養介入及未遵循營養師建議之營養介入差異，並評估兩者配方的重要營養成分熱量和蛋白質差距、患者的體重變化及住院時間長短等數據後，結果顯示若營養師能全權處理營養建議，不僅能更準確評估患者三大營養素所需，體重變化及住院時間長短皆優於未遵循之組別；將此概念套用至特定疾病配方食品的給予建議上，即可知營養師之重要性及不可或缺性。 
然而根據調查發現，除醫院營養相關部門外，現今許多販售特定疾病配方食品之銷售人員皆無營養師執照，甚至連營養相關背景都未有；已有許多資料顯示未受營養專業訓練之人士經常會推薦錯誤的產品或不知該如何選擇，例如曾有尚不需洗腎之慢性腎臟病患者至藥局購買營養品進行營養補充，但門市銷售人士卻推薦高蛋白配方食用。後續雖由營養師發現此嚴重問題並立即修正，但推估其每日蛋白質攝取量早已遠遠超標，而此現象必定加重腎臟負擔；另外根據經驗，來購買營養品補充之患者通常不會只有一種疾病，在多重疾病的情況下，由營養師指導並選擇正確的營養品更為重要，但目前卻經常耳聞許多非營養領域的銷售人士遇此情況時往往不知所措，不知道應以何種疾病為基準進行推薦，如此可能會無意間造成食用者身體之負擔；輕則無礙，重則影響到疾病進程，甚至因此增加健保財政之負擔。 
萬不可小看飲食營養對身體之影響，往往愈容易讓我們忽略得反而愈是需要關注的重點。因此，由營養師來進行販售既可避免推薦錯誤的特定疾病配方食品，也能達到最適宜的營養支持，更可協助疾病療程，降低醫療成本。 
最後，儘管現今台灣有明令規範“須經醫師及營養師指導使用”，但現實情況是：在坊間的銷售據點購買幾乎無法達成此規範，更遑論能得到最適宜的建議。綜觀國際上各國規範，除了澳洲、紐西蘭食品規範中，特定疾病配方食品章節有表列出銷售者為醫師、營養師等專業醫療人員外，其餘國家並無明定類似準則。期勉我國能於尊重專業的前提下，將特定疾病配方食品的銷售權回歸具營養專業的營養師，放眼未來必能創造多贏局面。 
  
參考資料： 
[1] Braga, J.M., et al., Implementation of dietitian recommendations for enteral nutrition results in improved outcomes. Journal of the American Dietetic Association, 2006. 106(2): p. 281-284. 
[2] 財團法人醫藥品查驗中心當代醫藥法規月刊－簡介特殊營養食品國內外管理概況 (2017) 
[3] Australia New Zealand Food Standards Code – Standard 2.9.5 – Food for special medical purposes
proposal_en: 1. In the medical field, it is a consensus that doctors diagnose diseases, pharmacists dispense and sell drugs, and nutritionists specialize in food and nutrition. Compared with other medical personnel, nutritionists have a solid and profound training in nutrition, so their suggestions for nutrition are undoubtedly more accurate. Places that sell specific disease formula food should have at least one dedicated nutritionist manpower to sell and provide public consultation on the purchase of specific disease formula food
title_en: The specific disease formula food announced by the Ministry of Health and Welfare should be sold exclusively by nutritionists

title_zh: 反核電卻不反核食？政府必須給出交代！人民拒絕核災食品，請民進黨政府說明為什麼核災食品進口立場髮夾彎？
proposal_zh:
民進黨多年來奉行反核黨綱，總是告訴支持者們「輻射很毒、核能很危險、核災好可怕」，如今民進黨政府說，我們要用科學理性，看日本核災食品解禁的問題、要跟國際接軌，看別的國家怎麼做，從開放的角度去思考。但民進黨「浮動的科學標準」讓我們倍感困惑，難道當初民進黨告訴人民的訊息都不科學？ 
  
過去，民進黨大張旗鼓號召群眾，大肆消費福島核災、販賣恐懼。他們宣稱核災輻射危害國人，臺灣不能成為下一個福島，一定要走向非核家園。如今，民進黨完全執政，核電還是不能用，核食卻可以吃了？蔡政府與日本到底做了什麼利益交換，竟然不惜黑箱蠻幹、強硬解禁？ 
  
民進黨掌握執政的權力，開始講求「科學標準」：只要食品輻射檢測合於標準，就可以安心食用；那麼民進黨講什麼輻射零檢出，談什麼非核家園呢？難道馬政府的科學證據不是證據，蔡政府的科學證據才是證據？還是日本政府的科學標準才是標準？ 
  
蔡政府執政以來，對內鬥爭寸寸相逼，對外談判節節退讓。反核的民進黨如今不反核食，表面上談科學證據，骨子裡卻是政治利益。請問政府，我們如何相信國人的權益沒有被出賣？蔡英文總統、林全院長若沒有給社會大眾一個清楚完整的解釋，臺灣人民絕對無法相信一個標準雙重，更輕易改弦易轍，昨非今是的政府。 
  
請民進黨政府說明： 
一、民進黨執政縣市的立場，在一天之內完全轉向，背後的決策考量為何？ 
二、我國是受到多大的政治壓力、私下與日本做了什麼約定，讓蔡總統不惜鎮壓全黨意志，也要急著開放進口？ 
三、馬政府時期曾研議開放福島等縣市食品進口的可能性，為何民進黨當時全力反對，現在卻全力支持開放？ 
四、過去民進黨採用反核團體的說法，抨擊馬政府對核能安全的科學數據，為何現在就相信食品安全的科學數據？ 
五、過去民進黨說不要再有下一個福島，如今民進黨執政，為何核電還是不能用，核食卻可以吃了？ 
六、民進黨政府雙重標準，在未回答上述問題前，人民拒絕進口福島、群馬、櫪木、茨城、千葉等五縣市食品入臺。
benefits_zh:
我們相當好奇，到底我國承受日本多大的政治壓力，或是蒙受多大的利益，才能讓蔡英文總統不惜力抗全民意志，甚至不惜壓下民進黨內反對聲音，執意開放核災食品進口？日本政府在包括漁權等各種議題上，一直沒有給我國公平待遇。馬政府時期，日本對韓國就願意給官方產地證明，對我國的要求卻是不理不睬！今日政府貿然全面開放日本核災縣市食品入臺，若對臺灣沒有任何利益，為什麼急著開放？政府與日本溝通的過程完全不透明公開，黑箱談判將損及臺灣的利益與人民的健康。 
  
扁政府時期，林義雄先生曾答應李遠哲院長，暫緩非核家園五十年。日本不幸發生福島核災，民進黨不顧一切科學證據，非核家園趁勢喊得震天價響。林義雄先生的禁食靜坐行動，更迫使馬政府封存核四。往事歷歷在目，卻不知人在何方。馬總統在卸任前夕，念茲在茲的就是能源問題，他把那些科學數字倒背如流；可惜蔡英文總統還有民進黨完全聽不進去。 
  
過去民進黨，一直刻意激起的不安，將恐懼深植人民心中，在這份恐懼消除前，不管怎樣的科學證據，都難以服人！這是民進黨造成也必須面對的政治問題，人民心中的恐懼一日未消，就無法面對所謂「科學標準」，社會上的每個人都需要政府一個交代，然後我們才有可能冷靜來談所謂的科學證據。 
  
 民進黨摧毀臺灣科學理性判斷標準，如今執政後髮夾彎，卻傲慢不與人民溝通，為什麼改弦易轍，為什麼轉換標準？若民進黨不願承認錯誤，不願面對過去自己灌輸給人民的觀念，蠻幹開放日本和災縣市食品，只會讓更多事實真相被掩埋，也會讓更多科學標準遭到忽視。
proposal_en: The DPP has been pursuing an anti-nuclear party program for many years. It always tells its supporters that "radiation is poisonous, nuclear energy is dangerous, and nuclear disasters are terrible." Now the DPP government says that we must use scientific rationality to look at the issue of Japan's nuclear disaster lifting food bans. We must follow international standards and see how other countries do it, and think from an open perspective. But the DPP's "floating scientific standards" confuse us. Could it be that the information the DPP told the people back then was not scientific? In the past, the DPP called on the masses with great fanfare, consuming the Fukushima nuclear disaster and selling fear. They claim that nuclear disasters and radiation will harm the people of the country, and that Taiwan cannot become the next Fukushima, and must move towards a non-nuclear homeland. Today, the DPP is completely in power, nuclear power is still not available, but nuclear food can be eaten? What exchange of interests did the Tsai government make with Japan, and they did not hesitate to act recklessly in a black box and forcefully lift the ban? The Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) seized power and began to emphasize "scientific standards": as long as food radiation tests meet the standards, it can be eaten with peace of mind; so what does the DPP talk about with zero radiation detection and non-nuclear homes? Is the scientific evidence of the Ma government not evidence, but the scientific evidence of the Tsai government? Or is the scientific standard of the Japanese government the standard? Since the Cai government came to power, the internal struggles have been pressing every inch of the way, and external negotiations have been steadily retreating. The anti-nuclear Democratic Progressive Party is not anti-nuclear food today. On the surface, it talks about scientific evidence, but in its heart it is political interests. May I ask the government, how can we believe that the rights and interests of the people of the country have not been betrayed? If President Tsai Ing-wen and Dean Lin Quan did not give a clear and complete explanation to the general public, the people of Taiwan would absolutely not believe in a government with double standards and easy to change course. Yesterday is not what it is today. Please explain to the DPP government: 1. The position of the DPP in governing counties and cities has completely changed within one day. What are the considerations behind the decision-making? 2. How much political pressure has my country been under, and what agreement has it made with Japan in private, so that President Tsai will not hesitate to suppress the will of the entire party, but also rush to open imports? 3. During the period of the Malaysian government, the possibility of opening up food imports from Fukushima and other counties and cities was discussed. Why did the DPP fully oppose it at that time, but now it fully supports the opening up? 4. In the past, the Democratic Progressive Party used the argument of anti-nuclear groups to criticize the scientific data of the Malaysian government on nuclear energy safety. Why do they believe in the scientific data of food safety now? 5. In the past, the DPP said that there should be no next Fukushima. Now that the DPP is in power, why is nuclear power still unusable, but nuclear food can be eaten? 6. The DPP government has double standards. Before answering the above questions, the people refuse to import food from five counties and cities including Fukushima, Gunma, Tochigi, Ibaraki, and Chiba into Taiwan.
title_en: Anti-nuclear power but not anti-nuclear food? The government must give an account! The people reject nuclear disaster food, please explain why the DPP government takes a hairpin turn on nuclear disaster food imports?

title_zh: 開放鸚鵡認養
proposal_zh: 希望未開放認養鸚鵡的縣市能在公告期限後開放讓愛心民眾認養，以保障鸚鵡生命安全與品質，而不是被當裝飾品與物品讓公家機構私下胡亂轉送特殊機構，鸚鵡是聰明的動物，跟孩子一樣，需要陪伴 需要細心照料。會帶給飼主很多療瘉與歡樂。請不要賤踏鸚鵡的生命。政府機關也需過濾飼主或固定回報飼養狀況
benefits_zh: 可讓喜歡鸚鵡的民眾飼養，也可減少收容所過多的動物，也讓鸚鵡多些找回原飼主機會
proposal_en: It is hoped that the counties and cities that have not opened the adoption of parrots will allow caring people to adopt them after the announcement period, so as to ensure the safety and quality of parrots, instead of being used as decorations and objects for public agencies to transfer to special agencies in private. Parrots are smart animals. Just like children, they need companionship and careful care. It will bring a lot of healing and joy to the owner. Please don't trample on the parrot's life. Government agencies also need to filter breeders or regularly report feeding status
title_en: Open Parrot Adoption

title_zh: 千足計劃-- 為提升國內足球參與可能，中央政府應鼓勵設置社區型足球場或複合式使用球場並規劃試辦計劃。
proposal_zh:
近年來，在基層教練努力與家長們的支持下，臺灣基層足球發展愈趨興盛，各項賽事參賽隊數也屢創新高。然而，基層足球人口上升，所伴隨來的最直接困境即為各縣市現有場地規畫之不足。 
  
宥於足球發展之弱勢以及公部門對於足球場地設施往往受十一人制球場的想像限制，無論是都會區運動設施興建過程中對於足球場地規劃的排斥，致使公用足球場設施缺乏。此外，近年政府在體育設施上又多集中於學校，又衍生各校因管理需求難以租借使用狀況。然而，運動場地之設置不應該只是零合遊戲，而足球場地亦不僅只有十一人制之選項、五人、八人以至於非正式之複合型兩用球場等社區型球場在日本及歐洲亦為相當常見之社區球場形式。 
  
參考德國在1998年世界杯和2000年歐洲錦標賽失利後，德國對於小型足球場興建之政策，以及2006年世界盃後，德國足協與官方共同制定之十年計劃” FUSSBALL IST ZUKUNFT”中，為提供青少年參與足球運動之可能，興建千座小型社區球場。此計劃不只提高了德國民眾足球活動的機會與熱情，更加強學校與俱樂部之間的合作可能，並降低了女子足球與移民背景的兒童融入社會的障礙。同時，社區球場的設置，也成為後續德國於2014世界盃奪冠、2016歐洲杯四強基層育成的基石。 
  
綜上，借鑑前述德國經驗與台灣目前足球推廣實務困境，為提升國內足球風氣與參與可能，爰提出本次台灣版之「千足計劃」倡議，期待透過中央政府之鼓勵與試點，打破過去多在學校設置足球場之校園本位、翻轉足球場只能大型或專用的刻板印象，以千座場地為目標，透過設置社區型足球場或翻修既有場地成為複合式使用球場(籃、足球兩用，或槌、足球兩用等)並規劃試辦計劃，增加我國運動空間使用之可能。
benefits_zh:
透過社區型足球場或複合式使用球場的設置，參考德國於” FUSSBALL IST ZUKUNFT”計劃之成功經驗，經由普及化的球場設施規劃，預期將能提高民眾足球活動的機會與熱情，加強學校與俱樂部之間的合作、增加了女子與草根足球的推廣及參與的可能。 
  
在足球六年計劃明顯有關場地設施政策明顯未能達成目標的此刻，期待台灣版的「千足計劃」能透過結合中央政府之鼓勵與試點，打破目前教育部在運動設施上的校園本位、翻轉足球場只能大型或專用的刻板印象，以設置社區型足球場或翻修既有場地成為複合式使用球場，增加我國運動空間使用之可能，並提供我國日益增加之足球人口充分且合法之運動空間。
proposal_en: In recent years, thanks to the efforts of grassroots coaches and the support of parents, the development of grassroots football in Taiwan has become more and more prosperous, and the number of participating teams in various competitions has repeatedly hit new highs. However, the increase in the football population at the grassroots level is accompanied by the most direct dilemma that is the lack of planning of the existing venues in various counties and cities. Due to the weak development of football and the public sector's imagination of football venues and facilities is often limited by the eleven-a-side stadium, whether it is the exclusion of football venue planning during the construction of urban sports facilities, the lack of public football stadium facilities. In addition, in recent years, the government has concentrated more on sports facilities in schools, which has led to the situation that schools are difficult to rent and use due to management needs. However, the setting of sports venues should not be just a zero-sum game, and football venues are not limited to the option of eleven-a-side, five-a-side, eight-a-side, and even informal compound dual-purpose courts. Community courts are also very common forms of community courts in Japan and Europe. Refer to Germany’s policy on the construction of small football stadiums after the defeat of the 1998 World Cup and the 2000 European Championships, and after the 2006 World Cup, the 10-year plan "FUSSBALL IST ZUKUNFT" jointly formulated by the German Football Association and the government, in order to provide the possibility for young people to participate in football, build thousands of small community stadiums. This plan not only improves the opportunities and enthusiasm for football activities of the German people, but also strengthens the possibility of cooperation between schools and clubs, and reduces the barriers for women's football and children from immigrant backgrounds to integrate into society. At the same time, the setting of the community court has also become the cornerstone for Germany to win the 2014 World Cup and the grassroots cultivation of the semi-finals of the 2016 European Cup. To sum up, referring to the above-mentioned German experience and the current difficulties in football promotion in Taiwan, in order to improve the domestic football atmosphere and participation, I proposed the Taiwan version of the "Thousand Foot Project" initiative. I hope that through the encouragement and pilot of the central government, I hope that through the encouragement and pilot of the central government, I will break the stereotype that football fields in schools in the past can only be large or special. Possibility of using sports space in our country.
title_en: Thousand Foot Program -- To increase the possibility of domestic football participation, the central government should encourage the establishment of community-based football stadiums or mixed-use stadiums and plan pilot programs.
